product_name:
Mortlach 15 Year Old
Game of Thrones Six Kingdoms
product_description: The ninth release in Diageo's Game of Thrones Collection, Six Kingdoms is a 15-year-old Mortlach single malt, matured in a combination of first-fill oloroso sherry and ex-bourbon casks.

product_name:
Clynelish Reserve
Game of Thrones House Tyrell
product_description:
House Tyrell of Highgarden, rulers of the Reach, are used to lush green scenery, echoed in the green pastures and rolling hills surrounding Clynelish Distillery. A House known best for their wealth and their emblem – the golden rose – the Tyrells are a proud and noble family, and like the golden rose are hiding thorns beneath their petals. Clynelish Reserve has a sweet and fruity flavor, with a spicy undercurrent, just enough to prove it still has bite. Made with water said to come from Clynemilton burn where the water runs over veins of gold in the rock, this single malt is light and floral like Highgarden, but should not be underestimated as it still holds a strong Highland character.


This light-gold Scotch initially offers fresh fruit flavours - such as mango and pineapple - before slipping into rich, sweet vanilla notes. It finishes with sweet, maritime notes that mingle with the light floral flavours which warm and build throughout, leaving the signature sweet Clynelish waxiness behind.

Tasting Notes (1)

Cardhu's entry in the Diageo Special Releases range looks at a type of wood the producer's rarely use – new oak. This was matured in new oak as well as refill and ex-bourbon American-oak casks for 11 years, layering spicy notes on top of the classic honey and fresh fruit Cardhu character.

Tasting Notes (1)

product_name:
Glenfarclas 25 Year Old
London Edition TWE Exclusive
product_description:
Made at Glenfarclas distillery and matured in oloroso sherry casks for a quarter of a century before being bottled to celebrate The Whisky Exchange's 20th Anniversary. Aromas of meadow flowers, baked apples, barley sugar and buttery brioche fill the nose, developing into earthy coffee and sweet raisins. The palate opens with notes of fruit cake, salted caramel and rich oak, developing buttery pastry, raisins and fruity espresso flavours and dry waxiness.


This bottle features a specially-created label, designed by our creative director Raj Chavda to pay tribute to London's vibrant hospitality industry.

Tasting Notes (1)

Originally released for the travel retail market, Laphroaig PX cask is aged initially in American oak and then in quarter casks before a final finishing period in ex-Pedro Ximenez sherry casks. A rich, sweeter and full-bodied expression of this Islay favourite.

Tasting Notes (1)
None

A blend from the king of independent Japanese distillers, Ichiro Akuto. In addition to whisky from his own Chichibu distillery, it also includes whiskies from America, Canada, Scotland and Ireland. As it says on the label – 'This is worldwide blended whisky'.

product_name:
Drambuie 15 Year Old Liqueur
Half Litre
product_description: A 50cl bottle of Drambuie's 15 year old whisky liqueur. Drambuie's longer aged whisky liqueur, with all the extra depth of flavour and general tastiness you'd hope that implies. One we're happy to see back on the shelves again.

product_name:
Whisky and Chocolate Pairing Gift Set
4x3cl
product_description: A great gift set for the chocolate lover, containing four perfect measures of whisky: Port Charlotte 10 Year Old, Talisker Port Ruighe, Tomintoul 15 Year Old Portwood Cask and New Riff Rye, each matched with a 25g of chocolate from Prestat. The set also includes a glass to enjoy the whisky from.

product_name:
Whisky of the Year 2021 Tasting Set
6x3cl
product_description: A Perfect Measure tasting set exploring the finalists for the 2021 Whisky of the Year. This set includes a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following whiskies: Nikka Coffey Malt Whisky, Johnnie Walker Green Label 15 Year Old, Kilkerran 12 Year Old, Glenmorangie Quinta Ruban 14 Year Old Port Finish, Port Charlotte 10 Year Old and Lagavulin 16 Year Old.

Whisky Thief is an innovative bourbon from Indiana. Aged in new American-oak barrels with charred oak inserts, which increases the speed of maturation. Fruity and spicy with notes of vanilla and mocha.
The revised 2018 edition of Charles MacLean's in depth guide to the world of Scotch whisky, exploring the production of our favourite spirit from field to glass.

product_name:
Whisky Trail by Elixir Distillers Tasting Set
6x3cl
product_description:
Explore the whiskies of Elixir Distillers' Whisky Trail series with this Perfect Measure tasting set. This set includes a 3cl sample bottle of whiskies from a number of releases in this series, including the Whisky Trail Retro Cars and Whisky Trail Concert Series - Cambus 1990, Linkwood 2010, Girvan 1989, Glenburgie 1998, Blended Malt 2001 and Ardmore 1998.


Please note


This pack was for a virtual tasting, so does not have an insert with tasting notes. The tasting is available to watch on The Whisky Exchange Facebook page.

product_name: Whisky Island: A Portrait Of Islay And Its Whiskies
product_description: A literary exploration of the fascinating history of Islay, from the wildlife, landscape and the shipwrecks that litter its shores, to the long history of whisky production on the island.
A book from Eddie Ludlow that will take you through how to taste whisky and write your own tasting notes.

product_name:
Whisky: The Definitive World Guide
2017 Michael Jackson
product_description: Although the great Michael Jackson is no longer with us, his wonderful writing lives on. This 2017 edition of his definitive volume on whisky, updated by Dominic Roskrow and Gavin D. Smith, is packed with stories about great distilleries, guides to whisky's aromas and flavours, and of course Jackson's expert tasting notes. Essential.

product_name:
Whisky Islay Decanter with Walnut Base
LSA 100cl
product_description: A beautiful mouthblown decanter with a solid walnut base and a hand-ground stopper. A superb gift.
Record information about the whiskies you drink and learn about this world-famous spirit with Whisky: The Connoisseurs Journal from La Maison du Whisky.

A book describing a different whisky classification system to the regional one that we usually see, breaking down distilleries based on flavour profile instead. This 2018 edition contains even more tasting notes and distilleries than before.

Whiskey-making in the USA has exploded in recent memory, with hundreds of new distilleries popping up all over the country. Join writer Dom Roskrow for a deep dive into American whiskey, teasing apart the stories behind the new whisky makers, from preachers to stockbrokers.
Whisky Japan is an incredibly comprehensive guide to the category. Including details of producers, production methods and tasting notes, this is an essential guide for any world whisky lover.
Stuart Walton's Whisky Cocktails is a must-have guide to creating drinks with the popular spirit. Covering history, recipes, equipment and techniques, this is packed with useful hints and tips.

product_name:
20 Whiskies That Changed The World Tasting Set
20x3cl
product_description: The past few decades have seen huge changes in whisky and this carefully curated tasting set dives into that recent history and gives you the chance to taste your way through the special spirits that have created the modern whisky world. Twenty whiskies, a tasting book and a pair of glasses – the perfect set to help you embark on a journey of whisky exploration and discovery. Read on to find out more…

With its gently curved bowl that fits comfortably in the hand, tapered sides rising to a smaller nose-sized aperture and a heavy base that make it difficult to knock over, the Glencairn has the perfect combination of aesthetically pleasing looks and serious nosing functionality, while also carrying sufficient heft from its crystal glass to feel good in the hand at events. The definitive festival tasting glass of the last decade, this is a modern design classic of its genre.

We've produced our very own tasting book. A handy guide to all things whisky – including a history of whisky in quotes, an overview of the regions of Scotland, how to taste and nose whisky, a useful glossary and, of course, lots of space for tasting notes. The perfect gift for any whisky lover.
A mini bottle of Drambuie, one of the most popular whisky liqueurs on the market.

Explore the world of Speyside whiskies with this Perfect Measure tasting set. From Balvenie to Blair Athol, Speyside is home to many distilleries, each with its own unique styles and flavours. This set includes a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following: Balvenie Sweet Toast Of American Oak 12 Year Old, Tomintoul 16 Year Old, Glenfiddich Fire and Cane, Cragganmore 2008 Distillers Edition 2020, Dailuaine 16 Year Old Flora & Fauna and Glenallachie 15 Year Old.
A 6 pack of Glencairn's specially designed whisky glasses - enough like a sherry copita to enhance the nose of the whisky while still durable, heavy in the hand and easy to drink out of.

Explore Japan with this Perfect Measure tasting set. It contains one 3cl sample each of Hakushu Distiller's Reserve, Ichiro's Malt & Grain, Mars Maltage Cosmo, Nikka Coffey Grain and Yoichi. Complete with a glass and full tasting notes, this is a superb way to discover Japanese whisky, and would make a great gift, too.

All the whiskies in this tasting set are from distilleries that have either been closed down or demolished, making them incredibly rare and sought after.


And when you sip them, remember that these are whiskies that will never be made again – a true taste of history.


This set contains a 3cl each of: Glen Esk 12 Year Old Bot.1980s | Rosebank 12 Year Old Flora & Fauna | Glen Mhor 1965 Bot.2007 Gordon & MacPhail | Lochside 1981 Murray McDavid| Banff 1982 Rare Malts | Glenury Royal 1973 Signatory.

A combination of aged Scotch whiskies, heather honey and a recipe of secret ingredients, Drambuie is one of the best-known whisky liqueurs worldwide.

Tasting Notes (1)

Enter the world of American whiskey with this Perfect Measure tasting set, including a 3cl sample bottle of Jeptha Creed Straight Four Grain whiskey, Jack Daniel's White Rabbit Saloon Special Edition, Woodford Reserve Wheat, WhistlePig 10 Year Old rye whiskey and Westland Peated American single malt.

product_name: Helsinki Whiskey Rum Cask Rye Malt
product_description: The 14th release of rye whisky from the Helsinki Distilling Company is a vatting of three casks that were hand-selected by master blender Kai Kilpinen and has been finished in ex-rum casks from Guyana and Jamaica.

A textured purple gift tube with our handsome branding* on the front. Offered as an add-on to some of our exclusive bottles, such as our own-label single-cask whiskies. It measures 300mm tall and 82mm in diameter, making it the right size for many standard whisky bottles.


*Well we would say that, wouldn't we?

Explore the world of indie bottler Watt Whisky with this Perfect Measure tasting set that includes whiskies and rums from its latest release of bottlings. This set includes at 3cl sample bottle of each of the following: Tomintoul 2010 10 Year Old, 2010 Blended Scotch whisky 10 Year Old, Arran 2012 8 Year Old, Highland Single Malt 2005 16 Year Old, Caol Ila 2010 10 Year Old and Foursquare 2007 12 Year Old Rum.


Please note


This pack was for a virtual tasting, so does not have an insert with tasting notes. The tasting is available to watch on The Whisky Exchange Facebook page.

A same bottle of Glenrothes Whisky Maker’s Cut, bottled by The Perfect Measure, this single malt is part of the Soleo Collection. Aged in first-fill sherry casks it has notes of oranges, vanilla, nutmeg and oak.

product_name:
World Whisky: New Flavour Dimension Tasting Set
6x3cl
product_description:
Whisky is a worldwide drink – you can find world-class drams being made around the globe. This tasting set celebrates the diversity of the whisky world, and includes tasting samples from England, India, Japan, Taiwan and the US.


This set contains a 3cl each of: Starward Nova (Australia) | Kavalan Concertmaster Port Finish (Taiwan) | Zuidam Millstone 12 Year Old Sherry Cask (The Netherlands) | WhistlePig 12 Year Old Amburana (USA) | Kornog Roc'h Hir (France) | New Zealand 18 Year Old Double Wood Small Batch.

Togouchi's ageing warehouse must be one of the world's most unusual – it is an old railway tunnel in the eponymous town that was never used. This is the 12 year old, a blend of Scottish malt and Canadian grain that's fruity and citrus-rich.

A Perfect Measure sample bottle of the 2017 vintage of Masthouse English whisky from Kent's Copper Rivet Distillery – matured in a combination of casks. The palate offers notes of green apples, ginger biscuits, tropical fruits, toasted oak, chocolate orange and white pepper on the palate.
The 10th batch of smooth, sweet bourbon whiskey bottled by Specialites Dumangin J. Fils offers notes of vanilla, white pepper, sticky caramel and crunchy toffee apples.

product_name: Forest Whisky 8 Year Old Blended Malt
product_description: This is a blended malt, made up of whiskies over 8 years old which have been finished in Oloroso casks. The blend changes slightly every time but it has a core of toffee and Caramac candies, a hint of spice with sweet fruit behind. The palate is juicy and full of ripe fruit with caramel on the finish.

A rich non-age-statement whisky matured entirely in first-fill sherry casks, with notes of orange, vanilla, nutmeg and oak. It is part of The Soleo Collection: a range of five whiskies from Glenrothes, ranging from 10 to 25 years old, which pay homage to the grapes from which some sherries, such as Pedro Ximénez, are made. The red label on this bottle reflects the colour of the grape just before it begins to ripen.

Tasting Notes (1)
A miniature bottle of Hebridean Whisky Liqueur, made with Scotch whisky, caramel and a blend of spices to a recipe discovered in an old Hebridean cookery book.
A bottle of Hebridean Whisky Liqueur, made with Scotch whisky, caramel and a blend of spices to a recipe discovered in an old Hebridean cookery book.

The 2017 vintage of Masthouse English whisky from Kent's Copper Rivet Distillery, matured in a combination of casks. The palate offers notes of green apples, ginger biscuits, tropical fruits, toasted oak, chocolate orange and white pepper on the palate.
 

Please note


We cannot guarantee the specific barrel numbers or date of release of these bottles.
A bright and fruity whisky, created for cocktails, Glasshouse blended whisky offers notes of red apples, summer berries and caramel throughout the palate.

The arrival of autumn heralds the arrival of Malt Whisky Yearbook. A useful reference guide, written by a collection of experts, it covers distilleries, independent bottlers, useful sites and much, much more. The perfect guide to the changes to the world of whisky in the past 12 months.

product_name:
The Whiskies of Scotland Jigsaw
500 Pieces
product_description: An excellent-quality, 500-piece puzzle detailing Scotland's whisky regions, their landmarks, their lochs and, most importantly, their distilleries. Puzzle your way from the Lowlands to Speyside and beyond; mark your own journey into whisky as you go or simply enjoy a ramble past the homes of your favourite drams.

product_name:
Teeling Whiskey
Trinity Miniature Pack 3 x 5cl
product_description: Teeling have been on the rise since the company's foundation in 2012. This gift set is a great way to try the range – it contains a mini each of the Single Grain, Single Malt and Small Batch blend.

product_name:
English Whisky Co. Peated
TWE Exclusive
product_description:
A peated whisky from The English Whisky Company, distilled at St George's Distillery in Norfolk and specially selected by the team here at The Whisky Exchange. It's a powerful and smoky dram, showing that Scotland doesn't have a monopoly on peat.

Tasting Notes (1)

A 1980s bottling of Drambuie Whisky Liqueur. First launched in 1910, it was just 6 years later that it became the first liqueur to be allowed into the cellars of the House of Lords. Derived from a Scots Gaelic phrase, the name Drambuie means "the drink that satisfies".

Charles Maclean's 'Scotch Whisky' is erudite, informative and entertaining - just like the man himself! Essential reading for new initiates to the wonders of whisky, and a great reference work for aficionados.
A great bottle of Suntory Excellence from the 1980s. This was imported to Italy and the gold paper labe on the neck states that this whisky is aged for at least 30 years.

A Perfect Measure sample bottle of the first release of Kornmod from Thy, made with a combination of Langelandsbyg barley that has been revived from dormancy from the Nordic Gene Bank and the modern Evergreen barley. Matured in a combination of ex-bourbon and ex-oloroso sherry casks, it offers fresh acidity, notes of liquorice, raisins, apricots, vanilla, honey and oak spice.

A Perfect Measure sample bottle of release 15 of rye whisky from Helsinki Distilling Company is a combination of three virgin American oak barrels that were hand-selected by master distiller Mikko Mykkänen. Aromas of vanilla, toffee, malted rye, dark chocolate and toasted rye bread fill the nose. The palate offers notes of dried apricots, liquorice, caramel, vanilla, coffee and cocoa that linger in the finish.

product_name:
World Whisky Blend
That Boutique-y Whisky Company
product_description: A blend of whiskies from around the world, created by That Boutique-y Whisky Company, this blend includes whisky from Scotland, Canada, Ireland, Sweden, USA, Switzerland, Netherlands, Taiwan, India, Italy, Germany, France, Japan and Finland.

Release 15 of rye whisky from Helsinki Distilling Company is a combination of three virgin American oak barrels that were hand-selected by master distiller Mikko Mykkänen. Aromas of vanilla, toffee, malted rye, dark chocolate and toasted rye bread fill the nose. The palate offers notes of dried apricots, liquorice, caramel, vanilla, coffee and cocoa that linger in the finish.

product_name:
English Whisky 2007
11 Year Old Sauternes Cask North Star
product_description: A 2007 vintage English Whisky from indie bottler North Star Spirits, matured in a single Sauternes barrel for 11 years, before being bottled in June 2020.

The 2016 edition of a great coffee table whisky book, edited by Charles Maclean and featuring contributions from a Who's Who of the international whisky gliterati: Gavin D. Smith, Dave Broom, Hans Offringa, Peter Mulryan et al.

You know it's officially autumn when the Malt Whisky Yearbook arrives. This useful reference guide is written by a plethora of experts and covers distilleries, independent bottlers, useful sites and much, much more. A great guide to the world of whisky and in particular the developments of the past 12 months.

product_name: English Whisky Co. HRH Prince Louis of Cambridge Whisky
product_description:
A specially produced, limited-edition commemorative release, celebrating the birth of HRH Prince Louis Arthur Charles of Cambridge, son of Prince William and Kate Middleton. The English Whisky Co love a royal occasion and choose great whiskies to celebrate – this is packed with sweet vanilla and banana notes.

Tasting Notes (1)

You know it's officially autumn when the Malt Whisky Yearbook arrives. This useful reference guide is written by a plethora of experts and covers distilleries, independent bottlers, useful sites and much, much more. A great guide to the world of whisky and in particular the developments of the past 12 months.
#2 is the lightly peated release from Denmark's Isfjord. Matured in bourbon barrels, finished in new oak, this is fruity and gently smoky with notes of caramel, chocolate and vanilla.
Isfjord whisky is distilled in Denmark, #1 is the unpeated expression, aged in oloroso-sherry casks – rich and complex with notes of dried fruit, vanilla and chocolate.

The seventh edition of this classic whisky tome is the second update since the passing of its author, Michael Jackson, in 2008. For this edition the text has been updated and additional tasting notes supplied by Dominic Roskrow and Gavin D. Smith.
Henebery is 90-proof rye whiskey infused with spices. The result is a spirit with notes of rye spice with citrus and floral notes.

product_name:
Bar Whisky Set
Decanter 160cl + 4x25cl Tumblers LSA
product_description: This beautiful set from LSA contains a sleek decanter that will hold up to 1.6 litres and four 25cl tumblers.

A 1970s bottling of Drambuie Whisky Liqueur. First launched in 1910, it was just 6 years later that it became the first liqueur to be allowed into the cellars of the House of Lords. Derived from a Scots Gaelic phrase, the name Drambuie means "the drink that satisfies".

An old bottling of Drambuie from back in the 1940s, the days when it proudly mentioned its Isle of Skye heritage and had a more noticeable dose of Talisker in its makeup.


Please note


This bottle is missing its red capsule.


This is an old bottle and the closure may have deteriorated - care should be taken when it is being opened. The item is sold as described and we do not accept liability for the state of the closure.

Ingvar Ronde's invaluable Malt Whisky Yearbook has had a revamp for the 2016 edition. It may have a different look, but the content is as useful as ever, with features from top industry names such as Ian Buxton, Charles Maclean and Martine Nouet. Always one of the must-read whisky books of the year.

product_name:
Dewar's Whisky Samovar Decanter
Early 20th Century
product_description:
Please note


This product has some chips on the bottom and lid.
An old litre bottle of Drambuie's famed whisky liqueur from the 1980s , the days when it was more influenced by its Talisker component.
A bottle of Drambuie's famed whisky liqueur from the 1960s, the days when it was more influenced by its Talisker component. This is presented in the unusual bottle size of 68cl.

The 2014 edition of the excellent Malt Whisky Yearbook, edited by Swedish whisky writer Ingvar Ronde. Included once again are features from many well respected whisky writers, lists of the world's best whisky shops and websites and many new colour photographs.
An old litre bottling of Drambuie. The whisky, honey, herbs and spice liqueur has been made since the late 19th century. We estimate this bottle dates from the 1980s.

The 2013 edition of Ingvar Ronde's excellent yearly updated guide to the world of whisky, and we're not just saying that because he likes our blog. Packed full of distillery information from around the world as well as new articles on the state of the industry.
An old bottling of Drambuie from back in the 1970s, the days when it proudly mentioned its Isle of Skye heritage and had a more noticeable dose of Talisker in its makeup.

A hugely informative labour of love by Swedish publisher and whisky nut Ingvar Ronde, the 2012 Malt Whisky Yearbook is, remarkably the seventh edition, and is bigger and better than ever. With comprehensive distillery profiles, in-depth articles from some great writers and bang up to date info on the latest events in the whisky world, the Malt Whisky Yearbook is an annual institution. A uniquely pleasurable read, as always.

The 2010 edition of Ingvar Ronde's essential whisky companion is the fifth in the series, begging the question - how did we do without it before? New features this year include interviews with distillery managers and a series of in-depth articles on the distillation process.
The latest edition of this great, great book. Ingvar Ronde's Malt Whisky Yearbook is utterly essential reading for devoted drammers.

product_name:
The Whisky Distilleries of the UK
2008 Reprint
product_description: A handsome recent reprint of Alfred Barnard's seminal 19th century tome about his famous distillery tour.

product_name: Perfect Measure Whisky Glass in Gift Box
product_description:
Designed by Whisky Exchange director Sukhinder Singh in collaboration with Glencairn Crystal, the Perfect Measure glass has taken years to perfect. Already a firm favourite with whisky experts – including award-winning writer Dave Broom, who uses it when writing his tasting notes – and a mainstay at our own tastings, it's the glass that gets the most from a spirit.


With a sturdy stem to give it weight, a wide bowl to allow flavours to develop and a tapered mouth to concentrate the aroma before you take a sip, it's designed to be the perfect glass to properly appreciate every spirit, especially whisky.
Chita is Suntory's grain distillery. The flagship release is aged in a combination of wine, sherry and bourbon casks. This is a light whisky with subtle notes of mint, honey and wood spice.

Nomad is a unique whisky. A collaboration between sherry producer González Byass and Whyte & Mackay master blender Richard Paterson. A blended Scotch whisky aged for more than five years in sherry butts is shipped to Jerez for further year's ageing in PX casks.

A delicate Japanese blended whisky from Kiyokawa, in Kanagawa Prefecture, Enso has been distilled using pot stills and matured in American oak casks. Aromas of lemon blossom, orange zest, vanilla, caramel and soft smoke fills the nose, complemented by notes of toasted oak, crunchy apples, cinnamon, woody vanilla and honeysuckle on the palate. Enjoy this whisky neat or as part of your favourite cocktail.

Islay whiskies are a beguiling mix of smoke, fruit and untamed coastal character, with each of its distilleries offering something different. This gift set is the perfect introduction to Islay, and shows off the characterful, diverse drams of this enchanting island.


Included are: Caol Ila 2008, Bowmore 15 Year Old, Kilchoman Machir Bay, Lagavulin 8 Year Old, Laphroaig Quarter Cask and Port Charlotte 10 Year Old.

A lesser-known whisky outside the local Japanese market, this version of Akashi is specially produced for the European market using a mixture of Japanese and foreign-made malt and grain whisky to produce a reasonably priced everyday blend.

When it comes to casks used to mature whisky, the most sought-after once held sherry. Packed with rich, fruity flavour, they are the source of many of the world’s greatest whiskies. This selection contains some of the best sherried whiskies on the market today.


This set contains a 3cl each of: Edradour 12 Year Old | Glendronach Revival 15 Year Old | Royal Lochnagar Selected Reserve | Glen Garioch 15 Year Old Sherry Cask | Tamdhu 15 Year Old | Bowmore 15 Year Old.

A Perfect Measure tasting set exploring the world of Suntory Japanese whisky. This set includes a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following: Suntory Hakushu 12 Year Old, Suntory Hakushu Distiller's Reserve, Suntory Yamazaki Distiller's Reserve, Hibiki Harmony, Suntory Chita Whisky and Suntory Toki.

Explore the world of Speyside whiskies with this Perfect Measure tasting set. From Balvenie to Glenfarclas, Speyside is home to many distilleries, each with its own unique styles and flavours. This set includes a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following: Glen Grant 18 Year Old Rare Edition, Balvenie 17 Year Old Double Wood, Benriach 21 Year Old Classic, Macallan Estate, Glenfarclas 25 Year Old and Mortlach 16 Year Old.

A versatile Danish grain whisky from Stauning that takes its name from the slogan of Denmark's first social-democratic Prime Minister, Thorvald Stauning, "Stauning Eller Kaos" – meaning "Stauning or Chaos". A combination of rye and malt whiskies, Kaos offers aromas of milk chocolate, cinnamon, caramel, bonfires and sweet cereals on the nose, complemented by notes of liquorice, baked apples, orange, vanilla and tobacco throughout the palate.
The Dubliner's blended whiskey is aged exclusively in bourbon casks. Mellow and rounded with notes of honey and a hint of pepper, this is a great introduction to Irish whiskey.

Packaged in an old-style bottle, Bulleit whiskey has developed a loyal following in the UK. The high rye content (around 30%) gives this bourbon a spicy kick.

Tasting Notes (1)

While Canadian whisky is often a showcase of different grains, Signal Hill focuses instead on casks. The distillery takes corn and malt spirit and ages them in three types of cask – ex-bourbon, ex-Canadian whisky and new oak. The three casks bring out different aspects of the whisky's character – vanilla and toffee notes, sweet grain and oaky spice respectively – creating a flavoursome and well-balanced whisky.
A 100% rye whisky from Koval, Chicago's first distillery since Prohibition. Producing using locally sourced grain, this is aged in new Minnesotan oak and bottled from a single barrel.

Fireball is made with Canadian whisky and natural cinnamon flavours. It's certainly very cinnamony, and it's not too sweet, which is a plus. A very popular shot drink on the other side of the pond, Fireball was awarded 87 points from the Beverage Testing Institute, and a Silver Medal from the International Review of Spirits.

Tasting Notes (1)
A blended Irish whiskey from Gelston's, made with a blend of locally sourced Irish malted barley and grain whiskey that is matured in ex-bourbon casks.
A Finnish rye whisky from Muteman, made with a combination of malted rye and malted barley and matured in hand-selected casks, it has been finished in ex-sherry casks before being bottled.
War Eagle is a fruity bourbon from Kentucky. With notes of vanilla, peach and wood spice, this is suited to cocktails.

Tincup American Whiskey is the brainchild of Colorado-based Jess Graber. A distiller as a hobby for 30 years, he turned full-time in 2004. A high rye whiskey, made with a bourbon-style profile but more powerful and spicier, the cap also works as a cup.

Tasting Notes (1)

A 1.5 litre bottle of the massively popular Jameson Irish Whiskey. The label is placed upside down to be the correct way up when the bottle is placed on a bar optic. One of Jim Murray's favourites, with 95 points in the Whisky Bible 2013.

The second batch of rye whisky from Oxford Artisan Distillery, made with a diverse maslin grain harvest in 2017, where different grains were grown together in the same field, including ancient heritage rye, wheat and oat grains. Matured in a combination of virgin American oak and ex-port casks, it offers aromas of aniseed, violets, banana, praline and toffee apples that fill the nose, complemented by notes of butterscotch, strawberry jam, caramelised bananas, raisins, walnuts, honey and ginger cake throughout the palate.

Dispel the mysteries of the whisky world with this authoritative book from David Wishart, Neil Ridley and Gavin D Smith. From the history of this great spirit, to the traditional production methods and the flavours, World of Whisky demystifies whiskies from all around the world.

product_name:
THY Danish Whisky Distillery Edition Sample
Cask #61+62
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of THY Distillery Edition Danish whisky.
Windsor is a long running Canadian whisky brand often exported to the USA. Easy drinking, as demonstrated by its old Mountie laden advertising campaigns - The smooth Canadian.

Carefully crafted to honour the beautiful Donegal coastline and the magical creatures said to reside there, Silkie blended Irish whiskey aims to be just as beguiling as the Silkies themselves, with its soft mouth feel and its rich and warming flavour.

Tasting Notes (1)
(ri)¹, pronounced 'rye one' is a light, sweet rye whiskey from the folks behind Jim Beam. Atypical and great for cocktails.
A mixture of Irish whiskey and stout, this pre-made Black Irish is a balanced mix of coffee, dark chocolate, cinnamon, nutmeg and orange zest notes.

product_name:
Knob Creek Whisky Show Package
2 Tickets
product_description:
A brilliant bundle including a bottle of Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon, a pair of tumblers, a Knob Creek water jug and a pair of tickets for Whisky Show 2021 on Sunday 3 October 2021.


Created to represent whiskey before it was mass produced, Knob Creek embodies the look, feel and taste of pre-prohibition bourbon. This is a long-aged, high-rye bourbon from Jim Beam.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.

product_name:
Knob Creek Whisky Show Package
1 Ticket
product_description:
A brilliant bundle including a bottle of Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon, a pair of tumblers, a Knob Creek water jug and a ticket for Whisky Show 2021 on Sunday 3 October 2021.


Created to represent whiskey before it was mass produced, Knob Creek embodies the look, feel and taste of pre-prohibition bourbon. This is a long-aged, high-rye bourbon from Jim Beam.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.

product_name:
Peat Brown Whisky Club Decanter 1.05L
LSA
product_description: A peat-brown Whisky club decanter, made by LSA, perfect for adding a stylish accent to your home bar or for storing your favourite dram.

A combination of English whisky and ripe quince, this sweet, fruity liqueur from The English Whisky Company offers a balance between malty, spicy whisky and tart, juicy fruit. Try drinking over ice, or mixed with ginger beer and a sprig of mint.

Made with 100% wheat mash, this expression from Reservoir is soft and sweet, with gentle floral notes. The nose has a rich port aroma and notes of caramel and oak. The palate holds notes of rose petals and sweet caramel, with a velvet-smooth texture.
This practical yet elegant glass will make your Whisky Sour taste that much better.

Produced by The Welsh Whisky Distillery Company more than one hundred years ago, it is one of only a handful of bottles known to exist from this lost distillery in Wales, there is one also displayed at Penderyn Distillery. A real piece of history and a true collector's item. Part of the cork has broken off but most of the original seal is still intact.
Try this on ice for Sacred's take on an Old Fashioned. This liqueur is made by blending three-year-old bourbon-aged English whisky with orange peels, star anise and cubeb.

Slane is a blended Irish whiskey aged in a combination of virgin-oak, refill-American-whiskey and oloroso-sherry casks. The result is an elegant and spicy dram with notes of caramel, dried fruit, caramel and butterscotch.

product_name:
Kennaway's Scotch Whisky
"The Spirit of the Age" Poster 61x48cm

product_description: A miniature of Nomad – a unique whisky. A collaboration between sherry producer González Byass and Whyte & Mackay master blender Richard Paterson. A blended Scotch whisky aged for more than five years in sherry butts is shipped to Jerez for further year's ageing in PX casks.
A 100% millet whisky from Koval, Chicago's first distillery since Prohibition. Producing using locally sourced grain, this is aged in new Minnesotan oak and bottled from a single barrel.

product_name:
Chesky Cherry Whisky
Fremy Fils Bot.1940s
product_description: A very old bottling of French whisky liqueur from Fremy Fils. Made with cherry and whisky (and therefore named Chesky), we estimate this bottle dates from the 1940s.

...You're Dying to Try But (Possibly) Never Will. The third instalment in Ian Buxton's '101 Whiskies' series. A journey through whiskies which have great stories, some common, some less so, all legendary.

A very interesting release from William Grant & Sons. Auld Alliance has been produced to commemorate the many years of exchange between Scotland and France (commonly known as the Auld Alliance). The drink of the same name is actually a marriage of Highland whisky and Armagnac from Gascony, in south west of France.
An old bottle of Paddy Irish Whisky (with no E). We estimate that this was bottled sometime in the 1960s.

product_name:
Zuidam Honey Whisky Liqueur
Half Litre
product_description: A honey whisky liqueur from multi-purpose Dutch distillers Zuidam. Made by Fred van Zuidam and his son Patrick, as with all their products. A blend of malt whisky and natural honey.

William Shakespeare Whisky Liqueur is based on a 16th-century recipe and combines whisky with crushed oranges and caramel. The bottle is reminiscent of the era and includes a copy of Shakespeare's last will and testament wrapped around it.

product_name:
Beer Hunter, Whisky Chaser
In Honour of Michael Jackson
product_description: A collection of writings on whisky and beer published to honour the memory of Michael Jackson. With contributions from the most respected experts in both fields and all profits going to the Parkinson's Disease Society, there's just no excuse not to buy it.
An aromatic bitters from Fee Brothers, produced in small batches and aged in freshly emptied whiskey barrels for a complex and woody flavour.

A release of grain whisky from Japan's Nikka, produced mainly from corn using one of their continuous Coffey stills. Rather than the rare and limited releases they have done before, this is a larger release to further show off this key component in the Nikka family of whiskies.

Tasting Notes (2)

Previously only released as part of single casks, Nikka decided to add their Coffey Malt to their core range in 2014. Distilled in a Coffey still normally used for grain whisky production, the malt is delightfully fruity and spicy.

Tasting Notes (1)

A modern recreation of a style of glass used by blenders in the 1920s, developed in partnership with whisky writer Angus MacRaild. The onion shape helps to concentrate the aromas and flavours, leading to a greater sensory experience. This will hold up to 225ml.

Balcones introduced their 100% Rye Mashbill with Elbon Rye from Northwest Texas, and also includes crystal, chocolate and roasted rye. It is distilled in copper pot stills, which creates a full-bodied style of rye whiskey.

product_name:
The Perfect Measure Whisky Glass
6 Pack
product_description: A box of six glasses, designed by The Whisky Exchange's director Sukhinder Singh – The Perfect Measure. Created in collaboration with Glencairn Crystal, they're shaped to be the perfect all-round nosing and tasting glass for spirits. A weighty stem, delicate wide bowl and tapered mouth intensify aroma and flavour to give you the best sipping experience.
A delicious whisky that is bursting with aromatic tropical fruit: mango, papaya and coconut. Nikka Coffey Grain is made mainly from corn in a continuous Coffey still, and is a fruit-filled treat.

Enjoy a variety of 18-year-old whiskies with this Perfect Measure tasting set. This set includes a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following: Deanston 18 Year Old Bourbon Matured, Bunnahabhain 18 Year Old, Glendronach 18 Year Old Allardice Sherry Cask, Talisker 18 Year Old, Ledaig 18 Year Old and Bowmore 18 Year Old Deep and Complex.

Released in 2015, Woodford Reserve Rye is only the third expression in the core range. 53% of the mashbill is rye, leading to notes of apple and sweet spice.

Tasting Notes (1)

A miniature bottle of Balcones Texas rye whisky is made with a mashbill of 100% Elbon Rye from Northwest Texas, and also includes crystal, chocolate and roasted rye. It is distilled in copper pot stills, which creates a full-bodied style of rye whiskey.

Time can do wonderful things to whisky, as this marvellous gift set proves. The recipient can use the glass included to create a rare side-by-side tasting of five superb 30-year-old drams from: Tomatin, Dalwhinnie, Loch Lomond, Highland Park and Glengoyne

A triple distilled Irish single malt whiskey from Dingle Distillery that has been matured in a combination of ex-bourbon and ex-Pedro Ximenez sherry casks. Aromas of lime zest, freshly-picked mint leaves and sweet pears fill the nose, complemented by notes of caramelised apple slices, raisins, vanilla, honey and mixed spices throughout the finish.

Kilbeggan is a blended Irish whiskey made at Cooley distillery in County Louth. Named after the distillery of the same name dating back to 1757, this is an elegant, sweet and malty blend.

Tasting Notes (1)

Thought peat was all about Islay? Think (or perhaps that should be 'drink') again. All Islay fans owe it to themselves to check out Connemara from the splendid Cooley distillery.

Tasting Notes (3)

A deliciously fruity and spicy whisky, brimming with candied lemon and orange peel, as well as cinnamon, clove and oak. Unusually, this is a malt whisky distilled in a Coffey still normally used for grain whisky, but the end result is glorious.

Although blended in Japan, Togouchui Premium Whisky is a blend of Scottish malt and Canadian grain. Aged in the town of Togouchi in a tunnel that was originally built for a railway but never used - intriguing!

Released in 2013, Teeling's Single Grain Whiskey has been matured full term in Californian Cabernet Sauvignon wine barrels, resulting in a spicy and fruity whiskey.

Tasting Notes (1)

Since the Teelings parted company with Cooley, the company they started, we've been waiting for their return and here it is – Teeling Whiskey. Finished in rum casks and bottled at 46% without chill-filtration, it's an excellent statement of intent. The blend is said to contain a high proportion of first-fill bourbon cask whiskey, and a higher-than-normal ratio of malt to grain.

product_name:
Teeling Small Batch Whiskey
2 Glasses Gift Pack
product_description:
This elegant gift pack contains a bottle of Teeling's rum-cask-finished Small Batch blended Whiskey and a pair of tumblers. The blend is said to contain a high proportion of first-fill bourbon cask whiskey, and a higher-than-normal ratio of malt to grain.


Please note


There is some damage to the inside of the cardboard box.

product_name:
Glenfarclas: Showcasing ABV Whisky Tasting Set
6x3cl
product_description: The strength of a whisky can have a large effect on its flavour, bringing out the bold, or adding refinement. This Perfect Measure tasting pack explores the effect of ABV on single malts from Glenfarclas, comparing whiskies of the same age but different strengths. This set includes a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following:Glenfarclas 15 Year Old, Glenfarclas 15 Year Old TWE Exclusive, Glenfarclas 21 Year Old, Glenfarclas 21 Year Old TWE Exclusive, Glenfarclas 25 Year Old and Glenfarclas 25 Year Old London Edition TWE Exclusive.

Teeling's single malt contains whiskeys aged for up to 23 years, which have been matured in a range of wine casks: sherry, port, Madeira, white Burgundy and Cabernet Sauvignon. A rich and spicy whiskey.

Tasting Notes (2)

product_name:
Suntory Hibiki Japanese Whisky Tasting Set
5x3cl
product_description: Explore the world of Suntory Hibiki Japanese blended whisky with this Perfect Measure set. Launched in the 1970s alongside the construction of Suntory's Hakushu distillery, Hibiki has gained a worldwide following and critical acclaim, thanks to its refined techniques and unparalleled blends. This set includes a Perfect Measure tasting glass, as well as a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following: Suntory Hibiki Harmony, Suntory Hibiki 12 Year Old, Suntory Hibiki 17 Year Old, Suntory Hibiki 21 Year Old and Suntory Hibiki 30 Year Old.

Explore the world of 21-year-old single malts with this Perfect Measure tasting set. This set includes a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following whiskies: Glencadam 21 Year Old, Glenfiddich 21 Year Old Reserva Rum Cask Finish, Glenfarclas 21 Year Old TWE Exclusive, Isle of Jura 21 Year Old Tide, Benromach 21 Year Old and Edradour 1995 21 Year Old Oloroso Finish.

product_name:
Currach Single Malt Whiskey
Atlantic Kombu Seaweed Cask
product_description: An Irish single malt whiskey from Origin Spirits, Currach has been matured in ex-bourbon barrels and finished for three months in virgin oak casks charred with Atlantic Kombu seaweed. Aromas of toffee, raisins, almond and smoky seaweed fill the nose, followed by notes of roast coffee, salted caramel, dark chocolate, nutty smoke and earthy umami on the palate.

product_name:
Premium Peated Islay Whisky Tasting Set
6x3cl
product_description:
The most southerly of the inner Hebrides, the island of Islay is a place of pilgrimage for whisky fans. A huge range of styles and flavours is produced at the island’s eight distilleries and this set showcases a few very special bottles.


Included are: Caol Ila 18 Year Old, Kilchoman 100% Islay 10th Edition, Laphroaig 25 Year Old, Lagavulin 2003 Distillers Edition, Bowmore 26 Year Old Wine Cask Vintner's Trilogy and Octomore 10.3.

A miniature bottle of whiskey produced by West Cork Distillers. Dubbed the official Irish whiskey of the legendary band, The Pogues is made in Skibbereen, west Cork. This blended whiskey is sweet and intense with notes of malt and cracked nuts.

The sixth release in the Icons of Wales series from Penderyn, Royal Welsh is a peated single malt finished in a ex-port cask bottled to commemorate the original Welsh whisky distillery at Frongoch which closed over 100 years ago. Delicate smoke mingles with vanilla, red berries and salted caramel aromas, while the palate offers notes of toffee, treacle, black pepper and heavy waves of peat smoke.
A Japanese blended whisky from White Oak distillery, Tokinoka White has delicate white chocolate and floral notes, alongside maple syrup, green apples and fiery pink peppercorn.

Akashi Single Malt Whisky is made at the White Oak distillery in the Hyogo prefecture. Producing using lightly peated barley and aged in three different types of cask, this is the brand's flagship malt.

Made with 100% Mexican Cacahuazintle corn, Abasolo is a rich, complex Mexican corn whisky, matured in virgin oak casks. The palate offers notes of honey, black tea, vanilla, leather and roasted corn fill the palate.

product_name: Spirit of Place: Whisky Distilleries of Scotland
product_description: A literary tour of 50 Scottish whisky distilleries from Charles Maclean, Spirit of Place offers a unique perspective on the ingredients, traditions and practices that create this legendary spirit.

Named after the oldest stone lighthouse in Japan, Hatozaki blended whisky is made at Kaikyo distillery. Matured in a variety of casks, including sherry, bourbon and Mizunara oak it has a complex character, with notes of cherry blossom, pears and caramel throughout the palate.

A six-pack of the modern recreation of a style of glass used in the 1920s by blenders. Developed in partnership with whisky writer Angus MacRaild, the onion shape helps to concentrate the aromas and flavours, leading to a greater sensory experience. This will hold up to 225ml.

Named for the Revelstoke mountain resort in British Columbia, this spiced Canadian whisky goes for more of a spiced rum approach than many of its competitors, layering on vanilla and caramel for a really flavoursome liqueur.
A deluxe Irish whiskey-based liqueur, the James Joyce-inspired Dubliner is a blend of honeycomb, caramel and whiskey flavours. Perfect for sweet-toothed whiskey fans.

product_name:
Talisker Port Ruighe Whisky Show Package
2 Tickets
product_description:
A brilliant bundle that includes a bottle of Talisker Port Ruighe, a pair of tumblers, a Talisker hipflask and a pair of tickets for Whisky Show 2021 on Sunday 3 October 2021.


An early 2013 addition to Talisker's range, taking their classic Skye whisky and finishing it in ruby port casks, rounding the edges and bringing in rich, fruity sweetness.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.

product_name:
Talisker Port Ruighe Whisky Show Package
1 Ticket
product_description:
A brilliant bundle that includes a bottle of Talisker Port Ruighe, a pair of tumblers, a Talisker hipflask and a ticket for Whisky Show 2021 on Sunday 3 October 2021.


An early 2013 addition to Talisker's range, taking their classic Skye whisky and finishing it in ruby port casks, rounding the edges and bringing in rich, fruity sweetness.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.

Bain's is the first South African single grain whisky, made in Wellington at the James Sedgwick distillery. Bain's has made an impressive debut in the UK, picking up a Gold Medal at the International Wine & Spirits Competition in 2010 and a Silver at the International Spirits Competition before crowning that with the title of World's Best Grain Whisky at the World Whisky Awards. Try it now with this Perfect Measure sample bottle.

A spicy, sweet single grain whisky from Thy Danish Whisky, made with a combination of Old Nordic rye, spelt and Odyssey spring barley, and matured in virgin American white oak barrels. The palate offers notes of acacia honey, vanilla, oak spice, green grass and warm leather that linger in the finish.

product_name:
Currach Single Malt Whiskey Sample
Atlantic Kombu Seaweed Cask
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of an Irish single malt whiskey from Origin Spirits, Currach has been matured in ex-bourbon barrels and finished for three months in virgin oak casks charred with Atlantic Kombu seaweed. Aromas of toffee, raisins, almond and smoky seaweed fill the nose, followed by notes of roast coffee, salted caramel, dark chocolate, nutty smoke and earthy umami on the palate.

product_name: Egan's Single Malt Whiskey 10 Year Old
product_description: Made at an undisclosed distillery in Ireland, Egan's 10 Year Old single malt Irish whiskey has been matured in American oak casks. Soft aromas of apples, cinnamon, nutmeg and ginger fill the nose, alongside delicate smoke. The palate offers notes of creamy vanilla, sweet malt and honey-nut cereal.

In typical Compass Box fashion, this is a beautifully-designed and -constructed gift pack featuring a rip-roaring trilogy of CB big-hitters: The Peat Monster, The Spice Tree and The Story of the Spaniard – each of which isolates and amplifies a facet of Scotch whisky character amid a matrix of carefully-measured complexity. At once thoroughly rewarding and remarkably approachable, this gift pack will work wonders at introducing someone to the delights of whisky, or an equally terrific job of getting people to re-evaluate their preconceptions around blended whisky and the art of making it.

An easy-drinking blended Scotch that's sweet and rounded, with notes of vanilla, woodsmoke and gentle spice. The whisky is matured using a combination of freshly-built oak casks from Ohio, and ex-bourbon barrels that have been double-scorched to enhance the vanilla and smoke flavours.


The Woodsman comes in a tree-inspired bottle that is designed to evoke the spirit of the great outdoors. It's a whisky that can be sipped or mixed into long drinks, and it pairs very well with buttered scones.

Tasting Notes (1)

Dunville's Three Crowns is a historic brand of Irish whiskey which has been revived by Echlinville distillery. Sweet and spicy with notes of dried fruit, vanilla and walnut.

Tasting Notes (1)

Created by Master Blender Akito Ueda, this Japanese blended whisky from White Oak distillery is a variation of the original Tokinoka blend. A mix of 50% malt whisky and 50% grain whisky it has been aged in three different types of cask – ex-bourbon, Xeres and virgin oak casks. A richer, fruitier blend than the original, Tokinoka Black has notes of pineapples, mangoes and toasted oak, building into spicier notes of ginger, black pepper and cinnamon. The finish is long and lingering, with notes of vanilla and honey.

product_name:
World Atlas of Whisky
Second Edition
product_description: The second edition of Dave Broom's World Atlas of Whisky – an essential guide for the enthusiast, with clear, beautifully rendered maps of the whisky-producing regions and of course vast swathes of Dave's erudition, wit and wisdom which has, as expected, raised the bar of whisky scholarship once again. A must-have.

Celtic Honey Irish Whiskey Liqueur is a delicious blend of Whiskey, honey and botanicals cut with spring water, all of which come from Ireland. Made in small batches this is pleasantly sweet and can be drunk neat or in cocktails.

A miniature bottle of Black & White Blended Whisky. Created back in the 19th century by James Buchanan, the label has carried the trademark terriers since the 1890s. An everyday drinking blend that was drunk by James Bond in Moonraker.

A blend of double- and triple-distilled malts from Lambay. This is a joint venture between the Baring family, which owns Lambay island, and the Camus family, which supplies the Cognac casks in which the whisky is finished after four years in ex-bourbon barrels. This is rich and fruity with notes of ripe bananas, ripe berries, coconut and malt.

product_name:
Nikka Coffey Malt Whisky Show Package
2 Tickets
product_description:
A brilliant bundle that includes a bottle of Nikka Coffey Malt Whisky, a pair of tumblers, a Whisky Exchange tasting notes book and a pair of tickets for Whisky Show 2021 on Sunday 3 October 2021.


Previously only released as part of single casks, Nikka decided to add their Coffey Malt to their core range in 2014. Distilled in a Coffey still normally used for grain whisky production, the malt is delightfully fruity and spicy.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.

product_name:
Nikka Coffey Malt Whisky Show Package
1 Ticket
product_description:
A brilliant bundle that includes a bottle of Nikka Coffey Malt Whisky, a pair of tumblers, a Whisky Exchange tasting notes book and a ticket for Whisky Show 2021 on Sunday 3 October 2021.


Previously only released as part of single casks, Nikka decided to add their Coffey Malt to their core range in 2014. Distilled in a Coffey still normally used for grain whisky production, the malt is delightfully fruity and spicy.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.

A sweet and smoky Danish single malt from Thy, Stovt is matured in a combination of bourbon, oloroso and Pedro Ximenez sherry casks, and is finished in casks that previously held Limfjordsporter from Thisted Bryghus. The result is notes of vanilla, dried fruits, caramel, liquorice root, sweet smoke and oak throughout the palate.

product_name:
Two Peat Brown Whisky Club Tumblers
230ml LSA
product_description: A pair of Whisky Club tumblers from LSA, made with peat-brown glass this is a stylish way to enjoy your favourite dram.

product_name:
Old Burnt Island Whisky Advert
Grange Distillery Framed 58cm x 83cm

product_description: A sample of Teeling Small Batch Whiskey. Finished in rum casks and bottled at 46% without chill-filtration, the blend is said to contain a high proportion of first-fill bourbon cask whiskey, and a higher-than-normal ratio of malt to grain.

Mars Kasei blended whisky is a soft, rounded whisky from Shinshu distillery in Japan. The nose is full of gentle white flower aromas and notes of sweet, ripe fruits, while the palate offers notes of warm spices, green apples, white grapes and honey.

A small-batch blend of malted and grain whiskies, matured in bourbon barrels before a final finish in Camus Cognac casks. Aged on the privately-owned Lambay island, this spicy, floral blend is the result of a collaboration between the Baring family which owns the island, and Cyril Camus, scion of the legendary Cognac house.

Tasting Notes (1)

product_name:
Biltmore Pure Rye Whiskey
Bot.1920s Hiram Walker
product_description: This Canadian rye whiskey was bottled in the 1920s by Hiram Walker & Sons.

From the Bladnoch distillery this is a blend of Bladnoch single malt and aged Speyside, Highland and Islay malts with grain whisky that is designed for mixing. Orchard fruits, toffee, sweet spices and a hint of smoke.

product_name:
Kopper Kettle Virginia Whiskey
Belmont Farm
product_description: The first Kopper Kettle bottling from Belmont Farms Distillery is a delicious sipping whiskey. Made with three types of grain, it is rested on Virginia white-oak and apple-wood chips for two months before being aged in oak barrels for four years.

To create this rich, nutty single malt Sacred have brought English whisky to London and moved it from its original bourbon barrels to hogsheads which previously contained Pedro Ximenez sherry. The result of this sherry finish is a five-year-old with notes of rich Christmas cake and clove, alongside the notable peat smoke and sea salt characteristics.

Field Guide to Whisky is a comprehensive guide to the spirit from Hans Offringa. Containing information of production, how to drink it, trends, maps and much more, this is an essential book for any whisky lover.

product_name:
Uam Var Scotch Whisky Decanter With Dispenser
Innes & Grieve
product_description:
Please note


There are some chips on this decanter.

product_name:
Teeling Small Batch Whiskey
Miniature In Jar
product_description: This gift pack contains a miniature of Teeling's rum-cask-finished Small Batch blended Whiskey and a small jar to drink it from. The blend is said to contain a high proportion of first-fill bourbon cask whiskey, and a higher-than-normal ratio of malt to grain.

product_name:
McDevitt's Old Irish Whiskey Poster
63 X 43cm

product_description: From Chicago's first distillery since Prohibition, this is produced from four types of grain – oat, malted barley, rye and wheat. Aged in heavily charred new Minnesotan oak, this is creamy and spicy.

product_name:
Lord Elcho Blended Whisky
Wemyss Malts
product_description:
Independent bottlers Wemyss Malts first launched Lord Elcho in 2014. They have trawled their stocks of casks to produce an excellent blended whisky with a notable spiciness. It's become an award winner before even hitting the shelves.

Tasting Notes (1)
A spring capped topped bottle of Buchanan's Liqueur Scotch Whisky (actually whisky rather than liqueur, that merely being the style of naming of the time), from back in the 1940s.
An old bottle of Huntly Royal blended Scotch whisky, produced in the 1940s by The Glendronach Distillery company in the days before they were bought up by Teacher's.

product_name:
Wright & Greigs Blended Whisky Bot.1980s
Large Bottle
product_description: A large 1.14 litre (old British quart) bottle of Wright & Greigs Special Blended Scotch Whisky. The duo were owners of Dallas Dhu distillery from 1899 to 1918. An everyday drinking whisky in handy party size.

A very smart and hugely readable journey through well-known whisky writer Dominic Roskrow's favourite drams, this large tome has been very well produced and put together and deserves to grace any thinking whisky drinker's coffee table.
A wonderful old 1950's distillery bottling of Talisker.

A well-balanced single malt Irish whiskey, Sexton has been created by master distiller Alex Thomas and is made with 100% Irish malted barley. It is triple distilled before being aged in ex-oloroso sherry casks, giving it a rich, fruity character with notes of honeycomb.

product_name:
Rye So Serious Virtual Whisky Tasting Set
6x3cl
product_description:
Explore the world of rye whisky with this tasting set from The Perfect Measure.


Inside is a 3cl sample each of: Few Immortal Rye (USA), Stauning Rye (Denmark), Michter’s US*1 Single Barrel Straight Rye (USA), Lot 40 Rye (Canada), The Gospel Straight Rye (Australia) and Arbikie Rye (Scotland).


Please note


This pack will be accompanied by a live tasting with Billy Abbott of The Whisky Exchange and guests from around the world. Join them at 7pm BST on Wednesday 25 August 2021. We will contact purchasers by email on the day of the tasting with details of how to join in using Zoom. The tasting will also be broadcast live and will be available to watch again once it has finished on The Whisky Exchange Facebook page.
A single malt whisky made in Texas by craft distilling powerhouse Balcones. It appeared in July 2011 and has been picking up awards ever since.

Made from roasted blue corn (a type of flint corn, like sweet corn, but with a distinctive blue colour). This received the prestigious Double Gold medal at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition and has butter, corn, spice and fruit notes, alongside a rounded nuttiness.

Tasting Notes (1)

Named after the oldest stone lighthouse in Japan, Hatozaki Pure Malt Japanese whisky is a sweet, smoky blended malt whisky from Kaikyo distillery. Rich aromas of dried fruits, toffee apples and summer blossoms fill the nose, and the palate offers notes of sweet honey, delicate wood smoke and sultanas.

product_name: Balcones Baby Blue Corn Whisky Miniature
product_description: A miniature bottle of a very interesting whisky, the first to be legally distilled in Texas, made from blue corn (not sure what that is, but it sounds impressive) and, remarkably, being the recipient of a Double Gold medal at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Definitely one to watch.

An Irish whiskey created by Sadler's Ales in Birmingham to accompany its Peaky Blinder beer. Harking back to Brum's colourful 1920s' post-war past and the Anglo-Irish Peaky Blinders gang, it's a small-batch, triple-distilled, blended Irish whiskey, with balanced fruit and spice. Just the thing to accompany a dark, old-school ale.

Roe & Co was launched in 2017, marking Diageo's return to Irish whiskey. A blend of malt and grain from various distilleries across the country, it's been matured predominantly in first-fill bourbon casks. This has a velvety, creamy texture and notes of sweet fruit and vanilla.

Tasting Notes (2)

A small batch bourbon from Daddy Rack, made with a high corn mash bill and matured in Virgin American oak barrels. Aromas of maple, honey, oak spice and caramelised banana fill the nose, complemented by notes of roasted apples, smooth butter, banana, vanilla, nutmeg and salted popcorn throughout the palate.

product_name:
Gordon & MacPhail Long-Aged Whisky Tasting Set
5x3cl
product_description: Explore the world of long-aged whiskies from independent bottler Gordon & MacPhail with this Perfect Measure tasting set that shows off the effects of time on this legendary spirit. This set includes a Perfect Measure tasting glass, as well as a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following: Glenlivet 1966 47 Year Old, Glenesk 1980 33 Year Old Rare Old, Longmorn 1973 42 Year Old. Strathisla 1972 Bottled 2013, Glen Grant 1962 Bottled 2006 and Glenlivet 1966 47 Year Old .

A lightly coloured young, extremely peaty whisky from an unnamed distillery somewhere in Scotland. It's got the rampant smoke you'd expect from a beastly named whisky as well as a pleasant, citrussy fresh fruitiness. The packaging is pretty striking too, with a scary monster and a (deliberately) singed label. Bottled at 46% and un-chillfiltered, just how we like 'em.

product_name: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Honey Whiskey Liqueur
product_description:
Long awaited in the UK and with a big following in the USA, this is Jack Daniel's honey and whiskey liqueur. A mix of regular Old No 7 and a spiced honey liqueur, it's got spice, sweetness, floral undertones and a long smooth finish. Drink over ice, chilled or even in a cup of coffee – it's rather tasty.

Tasting Notes (2)

A single batch Irish whiskey from Clonakilty, finished in virgin oak casks and matured in a warehouse overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. Soft aromas of sweet spices, freshly-cut grass, ripe orchard fruits and leather fill the nose, and the palate offers notes of fresh ginger, cubeb pepper, hazelnut, almond and grass.

product_name:
Chichibu Single Malt Japanese Whisky Tasting Set
6x3cl
product_description: Founded in 2004 by Ichiro Akuto, Chichibu Distillery in Japan quickly gained a cult following thanks to its small production and limited-releases. This Perfect Measure tasting set explores some of our favourite releases from Chichibu and includes a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following: Chichibu London Edition 2018, Chichibu London Edition 2019, Chichibu On The Way Bottled 2019, Chichibu London Edition 2020, Chichibu the Peated 2018 and Chichibu On The Way Bottled 2015.

The ongoing release of single pot still Irish whiskey from Drumshanbo distillery, made with a combination of unmalted Irish barley and Irish Banna oats. Matured in a combination of ex-bourbon barrels and ex-oloroso sherry casks, it offers aromas of vanilla, dried fruit, sweet spices and white pepper on the nose, complemented on the palate by notes of toasted oak, green apples, figs and sherry.

A straight wheat whiskey from grain-to-glass distillery MB Roland in Kentucy, made using red winter wheat white corn and malted barley. Aromas of vanilla, cookie dough, white pepper and pine needles fill the nose, complemented by notes of toast, raisins, lemon zest, milk chocolate and pepper throughout the palate.

product_name:
Sadler’s Peaky Blinder Irish Whiskey
Hip Flask Gift Set
product_description: A lovely gift set from Sadler's, including a bottle of Peaky Blinders Irish whiskey, as well as a Sadler's hipflask.

The One Fine Blended Whisky combines The Lakes single malt with both grain and malt whiskies from Scotland. Complex yet balanced, the palate offers notes of honey-roasted nuts, peaches, treacle, cinnamon, toasted oak and dried fruits.

product_name:
Bowmore 15 Year Old Whisky Show Package
1 Ticket
product_description:
A brilliant bundle that includes a bottle of Bowmore 15 Year Old, a pair of Bowmore glasses and a Whisky Exchange tasting book, as well as a ticket for Whisky Show 2021 on Sunday 3 October 2021.


This 15-year-old single malt, which spends its final three years in oloroso sherry casks, is elegantly balanced between this sherry influence and the distillery's fruit and peat characteristics – including a siren-like whisper of tropical fruit that will delight fans of older-style Bowmore. Now is the time to try Bowmore 15 Year Old, which reflects the best of the distillery's output from around the new millennium.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.

A full-bodied, spicy German rye whisky from Stork Club, matured in a combination of American & German Napoleon Oak, ex-white wine casks and ex-sherry casks, creating layers of fruit and spices throughout the palate.

A triple distilled blended Irish whiskey from Clonakilty's Cask Finish Series, finished in port casks. Aromas of ripe peaches, lively citrus, creamy vanilla and delicate oak spice fill the nose, complimented by notes of cardamom, chilli, peach compote and orange zest on the palate.

product_name:
Jack Daniel's Tennessee Honey Whiskey Liqueur
Small Bottle
product_description: A 20cl bottle of Jack Daniel's massively popular Honey liqueur, blending together Old No.7 and honey for a spicy spirit that's great on its own, over ice or in cocktails.

product_name: Old Pulteney Stroma Malt Whisky Liqueur
product_description: From its beautiful wave-adorned bottle to the rich and sweet liquid inside, this is a step up from the Old Pulteney liqueur of the past. Stroma, meaning 'island in the stream', refers to the dangerous currents around the north-east coast of Scotland where the distillery lies and the maritime spirit that is firmly part of Pulteney’s character. Sweet and robust with rugged undertones and a warm finish.

An interesting Canadian whisky liqueur combining two icons of the country - whisky and maple syrup. They age their quadruple distilled whisky in ex-bourbon barrels and blend it with 'Canada 1 Light' maple syrup from Quebec before resting and bottling.

product_name:
Glenlivet 15 Year Old Whisky Show Package
2 Tickets
product_description:
A brilliant bundle including a bottle of Glenlivet 15 Year Old, a pair of tickets for Whisky Show 2021 on Sunday 3 October 2021, a pair of Glenlivet tasting glasses and a Whisky Exchange tasting notes book.


A cut above the standard-issue 12yo, Glenlivet 15yo is finished, as the name suggests, in Limousin French Oak (the same kind that is used for many Cognacs). Expect rich notes of fruit, almonds and sweet spice.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.

product_name:
Clonakilty Single Grain Irish Whiskey
Bordeaux Wine Finish
product_description: A single grain Irish whiskey from Clonakilty, finished in ex-Bordeaux wine casks. Sweet aromas of raspberries, rhubarb and custard fill the nose, complimenting notes of strawberries, cream, honey and wood spice throughout the palate.

product_name:
The Dead Rabbit Irish Whiskey
5 Year Old
product_description: A whiskey created by the Dublin Liberties distillery and the founders of the New York's excellent Dead Rabbit Saloon, one of the world's best cocktail bars and an all-round great place to go for a drink. A blend of malt and grain whiskeys, this is matured first in bourbon casks before a finish in virgin American-oak casks for an extra kick of spice.
Matured for at least six years, Kinahan's Blended Irish Whiskey is a full-flavoured blend with notes of green apple, dark chocolate and mint.
Ragtime is an American rye whisky from New York Distilling Company. The rye is grown within New York state and the whiskey is aged in full-sized barrels. Robust and spicy – a superb rye whiskey.
Dubbed the official Irish whiskey of the legendary band, The Pogues is made in Skibbereen, west Cork. This blended whiskey is sweet and intense with notes of malt and cracked nuts.
A Frank-Lin Distillers-owned brand, 8 Seconds' is a range of Canadian whiskies. This is their blended whisky, with rich flavours, yet an easy-drinking nature.

product_name:
Jack Daniel's Tennessee Honey Whiskey Liqueur
Half Bottle
product_description: A half bottle of Jack Daniel's phenomenally popular honey and whiskey liqueur - a great balance of sweetness and bourbon spice.

product_name:
Best Collection of Malt Whiskies
Part Two
product_description: The second volume documenting Valentino Zagatti's famous whisky collection was released in 2004. Containing images of bottles that have very rarely been seen, this is a fascinating read for any whisky fan.

product_name:
Bowmore 15 Year Old Whisky Show Package
2 Tickets
product_description:
A brilliant bundle that includes a bottle of Bowmore 15 Year Old, a pair of Bowmore glasses and a Whisky Exchange tasting book, as well as a pair of tickets for Whisky Show 2021 on Sunday 3 October 2021.


This 15-year-old single malt, which spends its final three years in oloroso sherry casks, is elegantly balanced between this sherry influence and the distillery's fruit and peat characteristics – including a siren-like whisper of tropical fruit that will delight fans of older-style Bowmore. Now is the time to try Bowmore 15 Year Old, which reflects the best of the distillery's output from around the new millennium.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.

product_name:
Glenlivet 15 Year Old Whisky Show Package
1 Ticket
product_description:
A brilliant bundle including a bottle of Glenlivet 15 Year Old, a ticket for Whisky Show 2021 on Sunday 3 October 2021, a pair of Glenlivet tasting glasses and a Whisky Exchange tasting notes book.


A cut above the standard-issue 12yo, Glenlivet 15yo is finished, as the name suggests, in Limousin French Oak (the same kind that is used for many Cognacs). Expect rich notes of fruit, almonds and sweet spice.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.

product_name:
Ben Eideann Fionain Kosher Whisky
Red Wine Cask Finish
product_description: A sweet and fruity Highland single malt from Ben Eideann, matured in American oak casks and finished in Cabernet Sauvignon red wine casks from vineyards located in the Jerusalem Mountains. The palate offers notes of Muscovado sugar, roast coffee, forest fruits and red berries that linger in the finish.

product_name: Clonakilty Single Grain Irish Whiskey Sample
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of single grain Irish whiskey from Clonakilty, finished in ex-Bordeaux wine casks. Sweet aromas of raspberries, rhubarb and custard fill the nose, complimenting notes of strawberries, cream, honey and wood spice throughout the palate.
A smooth, sweet American whiskey from Yellow Rose Distilling, with notes of banana, caramel and vanilla throughout the palate.

product_name:
St George Single Malt Whiskey
Lot 18
product_description: A Californian single malt whiskey from St George Spirits, with notes of hazelnut, cocoa and aromatic wood smoke throughout the palate.

Duneville's Three Crowns Peated Irish whiskey is a sweet, fruity and gently smoky blend. Aromas of butterscotch, milk chocolate and vanilla fill the nose, and the palate offers notes of honey, mocha, stewed pears, earthy peat smoke and dried apricots.

product_name: Stalk & Barrel Single Malt Whisky Cask Strength
product_description:
The first single malt produced in Ontario for more than a century - and it doesn't disappoint. This small-batch whisky, aged in ex-bourbon casks for a minimum of three years, offers a complexity and depth of flavour that many have described as beyond its years.


This creamy, easy-drinking single malt is packed full of cereal, vanilla, malt, grape, pear, ginger and cinnamon notes, with a lingering fruit and spice finish. This cask strength version is a punchier version of the standard bottling and highlights the intense spice and fruit flavours.

product_name:
Uam Var Famous Scotch Whisky
Bot.1960s

product_description: Made with 100% rye sourced from local Virginian farms, this has the classic rye notes of spice and pepper, balanced by subtle caramel sweetness and toasty oak notes. Ideal in a classic whiskey cocktail such as a Manhattan or Old Fashioned.

Full of youthful energy, this mixed-grain American is defined by wholesome cereal, herbal high notes and a hint of tobacco on the finish, all set against a surprising malty backdrop. Unashamedly direct, you might be tempted to mix it, but to dilute this would be a mistake – pour it, add a dash of water and appreciate it for what it is: American whiskey by name and nature.

product_name: Old Pulteney Stroma Malt Whisky Liqueur Sample
product_description: Try a sample of Old Pulteney's delicious whisky liqueur before deciding on a whole bottle – although given the rave reviews it constantly receives, that decision might not be a hard one.

The New Single Malt Whiskey is a collaboration between Clay Risen, Chip Tate and Carlo DeVito. It is an essential guide to single malt whisky, both from Scotland and the 'new world. Including cocktail recipes, this is a must-read for any whisky fan.

product_name:
Banff Pure Scotch Malt Whisky
Empty Decanter
Dad's Hat Pennsylvania Rye Whiskey Vermouth Finish
product_description:
This expression of Dad's Hat Pennsylvania Rye Whiskey is made from a mashbill of 80% rye, 15% malted barley and 5% malted rye. Aged for six months in charred, new oak quarter casks, it is then finished for three months in casks which used to hold Vya Sweet Vermouth, adding a fruitiness to the classic spicy rye whiskey.

Tasting Notes (1)
Pow-wow gets its name from an old Algonquin (a rarely spoken Canadian language) word for gathering. This rye whiskey is infused with botanicals including saffron and orange peel.

The 2011 special edition of Jack Daniel's, bottled in honour of Mr Daniel's 161st birthday. This is their controversial changed bottle shape with a black wrap, the first of the new bottles that we've had in.

product_name: Proper No. Twelve Blended Irish Whiskey
product_description:
A delicious blended Irish whiskey that has been aged in ex-bourbon barrels, giving it smooth notes of vanilla, honey and toasted oak. Made at one of Ireland’s oldest distilleries, this whiskey has a traditional Irish character.


Created by UFC star Conor McGregor, Proper No. Twelve aims to show the passion put into making Irish whiskey, and the passion of those that drink it. A special blend created by McGregor and Master Distiller David Elder, this triple-distilled blend is fruity and sweet, perfect for sipping.

product_name:
Kopper Kettle Virginia Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Belmont Farm
product_description: Rich, full-flavoured Virginian bourbon bursting with notes of cocoa, vanilla, caramel and woody spice. Made from grain to bottle at Belmont Farms Distillery and bottled at a punchy 46% ABV, this would be ideal used in a classic bourbon cocktail.

product_name:
Proper No. Twelve Blended Irish Whiskey
Bottle Hoodie Pack
product_description:
A novelty bottle delicious blended Irish whiskey, with a stylish green bottle hoodie, that has been aged in ex-bourbon barrels, giving it smooth notes of vanilla, honey and toasted oak. Made at one of Ireland’s oldest distilleries, this whiskey has a traditional Irish character.


Created by UFC star Conor McGregor, Proper No. Twelve aims to show the passion put into making Irish whiskey, and the passion of those that drink it. A special blend created by McGregor and Master Distiller David Elder, this triple-distilled blend is fruity and sweet, perfect for sipping.

product_name: Rampur Double Cask Single Malt Whisky
product_description: Matured in a combination of ex-bourbon barrels and European oak sherry casks, this Indian single malt from Rampur has a rich, complex character. Aromas of tropical fruits mingle with sweet malt, oak, honey and dried fruits on the nose, and the palate offers notes of dark berries, dried fruits, cinnamon, nutmeg and salted caramel.

product_name:
Waterford Edition 1.1 Irish Whiskey Tasting Set
6x3cl
product_description:
Irish distillery Waterford have taken an in-depth look at the terroir of whiskey, taking careful note of the provenance of its grains - where and how its grown is key. Its Single Farm Origin series explores the different flavours produced by barley grown on different farms throughout Ireland. This Perfect Measure tasting set explores the first wave of whiskies released in this incredible series.


This set includes a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following: Waterford Bannow Island 1.1, Waterford Ballykilchavan 1.1, Waterford Sheestown 1.1, Waterford Lakefield 1.1 and Waterford Hook Head 1.1.

product_name: The English Original Single Malt Whisky
product_description: The ongoing unpeated release from The English Whisky Co, Original is aged in bourbon casks, creating a whisky with notes of vanilla ice cream, nuts and a hint of sea spray.
