Ballantine's 30 Year Old
Crystal Decanter Bot.1950s
product_description: A heavy 75cl Ballatine's crystal decanter from the 1950s, filled with their 30 year old blend.
A rare bottle from the Old Parr 'Seasons' collection released several years ago.

product_name:
Royal Salute 50 Year Old
Coronation Cask
product_description:
Royal Salute 50 year old is a blend of robust and powerful whiskies each matured in oak casks for a minimum of 50 years, resulting in a deep and sumptuous whisky.

Tasting Notes (2) 

Please note


Scratches to the presentation box.
An old bottle of world best selling J & B blended Scotch whisky. The brand was created over a century ago and we estimate this bottle dates from the 1970s.
An old bottling of 12 year-old Chivas Regal from the 1970s.

product_name:
Black & White 8 Year Old
Bot.1930s Spring Cap
product_description: An almost antique bottling of legendary blended whisky Black & White in surprisingly good condition. We believe this was bottled in the 1930s.
A top-quality Buchanan's for the export market.

A Dalwhinnie-based deluxe blend launched by Diageo in Venezuela, Mexico, Colombia and duty-free markets in Latin America "to deliver enhanced margin by targeting the premiumisation trend", it says here. Best In Class at the International Wines and Spirits Competition 2006.
An old bottling by Chivas designed for the travel retail market.

Quite simply, a magnificent whisky. At the International Spirits Challenge, Ballantine's 30yrs won a Gold Medal, an ISC Trophy (the second in four years) and was named as Category Champion for Blended Scotch Whisky. A masterpiece of blending.

This year's traditional Bell's Christmas decanter 'Five Queens' tells the story of Sir Miles Partridge, who beat King Henry VIII at poker dice, winning a clochier containing four 'Jesus Bells' at St Paul's school. And was later hanged on felony charges.
A bottle of Chivas Regal's popular 12 year old. Consistently in the top three brands in terms of whisky sales worldwide, we estimate this was bottled in the 1980s.
An old White Horse blended Scotch whisky bottled in the year 1960.

product_name:
Whyte & Mackay 25 Year Old
Millennium Blend
product_description: A rare 25 year old blend only given to staff at Whyte & Mackay to celebrate the beginning of the new millennium.

A marvellous old bottle of Dewar's Ancestor from the 1950s, sealed with a collector-friendly springcap. Ancestor was one of the deluxe blends in Dewar's range, containing a fair proportion of long-aged whisky, so this should be superb.

product_name:
Dewar's Victoria Vat 12 Year Old
Bot. 1940's

product_description: An old bottling of Black & White with a spring cap. The brand was created by James Buchanan in the 19th century and we estimate this bottle dates from the 1950s.
A bottle of Ballantine's 17 year old blended Scotch whisky. We estimate that this was bottled sometime in the 1960s.

product_name:
Royal Salute 38 Year Old
Stone of Destiny
product_description: A very special 38yo Royal Salute from Chivas, Stone of Destiny is named after the ancient stone used for British Royal coronation ceremonies for centuries, symbolizing the approval for the incoming king.

product_name:
Grant's Castle Grant
21 Year Old Bot.1980s
product_description: A Royal Doulton ceramic decanter containing a special 21 year old blended whisky from this historic producer. This blend was released sometime around 1990.
A miniature bell decanter filled with Bell's blended whisky produced to celebrate Cherrybank Gardens, the park in Perth that houses the Scottish National Heather Collection.
A mammoth gallon bottle of Jameson, the world's biggest Irish whiskey brand. One of Jim Murray's favourites, with 95 points in the Whisky Bible 2013.
A rare distillery bottling of single grain whisky from Cambus, normally only found hidden in blended whiskies.

product_name:
Whyte & Mackay 18 Year Old
Founders Reserve Bot.1990s

product_description: A special edition bottling of Royal Salute, produced in very limited quantities from whisky aged for at least 21 years (with much older spirit rumoured to be in the mix).
An old release from Old Parr. This was part of their 'seasonal' range and exhibits flavours they feel the suit Winter.

Part of a series of seasonal-themed blends from Old Parr, Summer is immodestly subtitled 'Fulfilment', which we'd like to point out (in the interests of staying on the right side of the trades descriptions act) is, for a bottle of whisky, a pleasant aspiration rather than a guaranteed outcome.
Part of a very rare series of Old Parr seasonal blended whiskies, this Spring release is subtitled 'Anticipation', although we're not really sure how that translates flavour-wise.

A bottle of Famous Grouse housed within a ceramic 'Highland' decanter. First blended by Matthew Gloag & Son in 1896, as of 2013, it has been the highest selling brand of whisky in Scotland since 1980.
A marvellous old 1950s bottle of the famous triangular Dimple bottle from Haig, sealed with a springcap.

product_name:
Dewar's White Label
Bot.1960s Spring Cap
product_description: An old bottle of Dewar's White Label. We would estimate that this was bottled sometime in the 1960s.

product_name:
Chivas Regal 12 Year Old
Large Bottle
product_description: Just about a gallon of one of Scotland's best blends, with a special stand so you don't break your wrist trying to pour it.

A very cool old 1950s bottle of Buchanan Deluxe blended Scotch, secured with a springcap closure. Spring capped bottles are highly-regarded by collectors as they are believed to offer the best chance of the whisky being well-preserved after decades in the bottle. Missing Label.

A litre of Buchanan's hard to find (in the UK at least) blend. 'Stunningly soft texture, enormously fruity with some firm grain through the middle and then spice. 85/100' Jim Murray's Whisky Bible 2005
Kudos to Tomintoul, who are clearly listening to their customers - this 14yo has been bottled at 46% at its natural colour without being chill-filtered. A big thumbs-up.
A miniature of the relaunched Glencadam 10 year old Highland single malt whisky, bottled at 46%.
A miniature of Old Ballantruan, the high-strength peaty single malt whisky made by Speyside distiller Tomintoul.

Create your own custom blended Scotch whisky in the comfort of your own home! The team at Chivas Brothers have selected five whiskies – four single malts and a single grain – to start you on your journey to being a master blender. Carefully measure out the whiskies of your choice using the supplied pipette and beaker to create a whisky perfectly tailored to your palate, and test it against a handily included bottle of benchmark blend Chivas Regal 12 Year Old. A great gift for whisky fans, or maybe even the start of a new career...
A miniature bottle of Glendronach's heavily sherried 12 year old.

product_name:
Around the World Tasting Set
2021 Edition 5x3cl
product_description: The 2021 Around The World tasting set from Perfect Measure includes a 3cl sample bottle of Filey Bay Flagship Yorkshire single malt, Frey Ranch bourbon, Starward Two-Fold Australian single malt, Amrut Indian Peated Malt and Helsinki Whiskey Rye Malt.

A Perfect Measure sample bottle of Danish rye whisky from Stauning – Bastard is made with locally-sourced grains and is distilled in a flame-heated pot still. After three years in Virgin American oak casks, it was transferred to ex-Oro de Oaxaca mezcal casks where it spent six months, before being bottled in August 2020. Aromas of sweet pipe tobacco, smoke, raisins, oranges, oak and oatcakes fill the nose, complemented by notes of vanilla, dried fruit, cinnamon, shortbread and brown sugar throughout the palate.
Teeming with strawberries and cherries, Pure Malt Red is aptly named, with a clean, elegant red-fruit character. A blend including Japanese malt from Nikka’s Yoichi and Miyagikyo distilleries.

A sample of a full-bodied and balanced bourbon, at once fresh, sweet and smoky, with a rich and rounded mouthfeel, Longbranch is a collaborative effort between Wild Turkey Master Distiller Eddie Russell and the brand's Creative Director – award-winning actor Matthew McConaughey.
A Classic Malts gift set featuring Dalwhinnie 15 Year Old, Glenkinchie 12 Year Old and Oban 14 Year Old.

High-class blend from Taketsuru, featuring a high percentage of Miyagikyo malt, which explains the vibrant fruitiness. This is aged for around 10 years in a variety of cask types, including sherry wood.

product_name: Berry Bros & Rudd Sherry Cask Blended Malt
product_description:
A rich and dark sherry-cask matured blended malt, put together by Doug McIvor and Ronnie Cox at Berry Bros to showcase the best of sherry-cask whisky.

Tasting Notes (1)
A combination of whisky of a wide range of ages, Distiller’s Reserve is a gently smoky dram from Hakushu, bursting with fruity flavour with notes of herbs and green apples.
Well-balanced blend including whisky from both Yoichi and Miyagikyo distilleries. Plenty of green-apple freshness, fruitcake spiciness, butterscotch and a herbal note of green peppercorn.

Douglas Laing's Big Peat is a Blended (as we have to call them now) Islay malt containing spirit from Ardbeg, Caol Ila, Bowmore and, shockingly, Port Ellen. Not as full-on as the name might suggest, but with pedigree like that at this price Big Peat is a nailed-on winner. Picked up the top prize in its category at the World Whisky Awards 2010.

A vibrant addition to the Nikka range, Nikka Days is a bright and vivacious blend of malt and grain whiskies . Its medium body hosts an array of floral and zesty flavours which mingle effortlessly with an underlying vanilla-toffee depth and a light, distant touch of breezy peat smoke. A fresh and delicate whisky, Days makes a delicious sipping dram or sits beautifully in a refreshing highball. Try it now with this Perfect Measure sample bottle.

Ahh, the sting of seaspray, the tarry rope, the spice, the kippers for breakfast, the comforting reek of peat! Ignore all the hype and treat yourself to three of Diageo's finest - perfect hipflask fuel for a walk down the shore.

This award-winning Japanese blend is bursting with character. Fruity and spicy, it benefits from a drop of water to show its true class. It won top prize in its category at the World Whisky Awards in 2007 and 2010.
A set of three 20cl bottles comprising Speysider Cragganmore 12yo, powerfully peaty Lagavulin 16yo & the smoky, peppery Talisker 10yo from the Isle of Skye. Perfect for hip flasks.

A cult favourite, Irish Velvet has a properly devoted following judging by the anguished comments we get every time we run out of stock (see below). A Christmas classic, made with Irish whiskey, sugar and quality coffee. Just add 3 parts boiling water to 1 part Irish Velvet and top with cream.
Dunphy's is an Irish blend made by Midleton, originally for the US market, but now available on this side of the pond.
A mini bottle of the Welsh Whisky Company's cream liqueur, combining Penderyn Welsh whisky with cream for a welsh take on whisky cream.
Magnum is a whisky cream liqueur, combining Benriach single malt whisky (aged in American oak casks) and Dutch cream. Best served simply – chilled over ice.

product_name:
Jim Beam Red Stag Black Cherry
(32.5%)
product_description: A warm, smooth liqueur from Jim Beam, Red Stag is made with a combination of black cherry liqueur and Kentucky Straight Bourbon whiskey. Try mixing this with coke for a sweet and fruity drink, or with iced tea and lemonade for a citrussy twist.
Higher-strength, deluxe version of Southern Comfort, this smooth liqueur is great for giving a bit of extra bite to any of the myriad cocktails that use it.

Introduced to replace the beloved Nikka 12 Year Old, Tailored is a blend including malt whisky from Nikka's Yoichi and Miyagikyo distilleries and its Coffey Still grain. The whisky balances soft fruity notes with bitter notes of dark chocolate and citrus zest.

Tasting Notes (1)

Taketsuru's no-age-statement blended malt contains a high percentage of malt from Miyagikyo, with the reminder coming from Yoichi. Aged on average for around 10 years in a variety of different cask types, including some sherry wood for extra richness.

Tasting Notes (2)

Welcome to the first new Jack Daniel's whiskey since before Prohibition. Tennessee Straight Rye is made from 70% rye, 18% corn and 12% malted barley, and is put through the same charcoal filtration process as Jack Daniel's bourbons. The result is a mellow and sweet whiskey that's enlivened with distinctive rye spice.
Super Rare Old is a famous Japanese blend from the Nikka company. This contains a high proportion of malt from the Yoichi and Miyagikyo distilleries.

product_name: FEW Cold Cut Bourbon with Cold Brew Coffee
product_description: FEW Cold Cut is a combination of bourbon and cold brew coffee, offering aromas of vanilla, toffee, orange zest, apple and coffee beans on the nose. The palate offers notes of cinnamon, cloves, caramel, espresso and honey-nut cornflakes.
Blended with Irish whiskey flavoured with honey and aromatic spices, Irish Mist is a liqueur with a devoted following.
A three grain bourbon from Chicago's FEW distillery, combining the legally required corn majority with spicy rye and a bit of malt to get things going.
Buffalo Trace Bourbon Cream is a sumptuous marriage of Kentucky bourbon and cream. This makes a delicious float – just add one part to two parts root beer, with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
A 2015 addition to the Jim Beam range of flavoured bourbons, this apple version is refreshingly crisp and pairs especially well in a long drink with tonic.

Now at a higher strength of 46%, Penderyn Portwood was matured initially in bourbon casks before being finished in port barrels. the result is a creamy and rich whisky with notes of honey and spice.

Tasting Notes (1)

product_name: Maker's Mark Kentucky Mule Cocktail Kit
product_description:
This cocktail kit contains (almost) everything you need to make delicious Kentucky Mules - just add lime juice. Inside is a bottle of Maker's Mark Bourbon, two 20cl bottles of Fever-Tree Ginger Ale and a highball glass.


Please note


This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.
A crisp, sweet liqueur from Jack Daniel's, made with a combination of Jack Daniel's Old No.7 and crunchy apples. The result is notes of green apples, honey and soft spices that linger in the finish.

Blended with Japanese malt from Nikka's Yoichi and Miyagikyo distilleries, this is clean, fruity and very easy to drink.

Tasting Notes (2)

A quality bourbon liqueur made with Wild Turkey Kentucky Bourbon and pure honey. The recently revamped packaging looks much better too. American Honey was named as World's Best Whisky Liqueur three years in a row.

Tasting Notes (1)
A quality cream liqueur made using whisky from Edradour, Scotland's smallest distillery – and one of the most picturesque, located in the beautiful village of Pitlochry.

An 81 proof (40.5%ABV) bourbon crafted by Wild Turkey associate distiller Eddie Russell, son of master distiller Jimmy. It's a high rye mash matured in heavily charred casks for big flavour at a more approachable ABV than the 101.

Tasting Notes (1)
Jim Beam Maple claims to be the first maple-infused bourbon released in the UK. Made using four-year-old Jim Beam whiskey, this can be drunk on its own or with a mixer of your choice.
Made with the finest Speyside whiskies blended with fermented comb honey and packaged in a square-edged bottle with a label inspired by Charles Rennie Mackintosh.

A vibrant addition to the Nikka range, Nikka Days is a bright and vivacious blend of malt and grain whiskies from distilleries including both Yoichi and Miyagikyo. Its medium body hosts an array of floral and zesty flavours which mingle effortlessly with an underlying vanilla-toffee depth and a light, distant touch of breezy peat smoke. A fresh and delicate whisky, Days makes a delicious sipping dram or sits beautifully in a refreshing highball.

Tasting Notes (1)

A blend including whisky from Nikka's two distilleries, Yoichi and Miyagikyo, The Nikka 12 is a well-balanced blend. There's green-apple freshness, rich fruitcake spiciness, butterscotch and some green-peppercorn punch. Another winner from Nikka.

Tasting Notes (2)

Hugely popular Scottish liqueur made with whisky, honey, spices, almonds and tangerines. The name is the phonetic pronunciation of the Gaelic 'gle mhath' meaning 'very good'. Rather brilliantly, Glayva is now trademarked as 'the best liqueur in the world' after winning the IWSC trophy a record breaking five times.
Bruadar is a liqueur (formerly known as Scottish Highland) made with malt whisky, honey and sloe berries. Not too sticky.

product_name:
Hudson Baby Bourbon
Tuthilltown Distillery Half Bottle
product_description: A half-bottle of the splendidly-named Hudson Baby Bourbon - the first legal aged grain spirit to be produced in New York since Prohibition ended over 75 years ago. Unusually for bourbon, Hudson's spirit is manufactured in a potstill at the Tuthilltown Gristmill (a heritage site) and is aged in small new oak casks.

Nikka from the Barrel is big-boned and bursting with character. Not averse to a drop of water, either. A real star, winning top prize in its category at the World Whisky Awards in 2007 and 2010.


Japanese whisky producer Nikka was founded in 1934 and has become Japan's second largest distiller, producing a large range of single malts and blended whiskies between its two distilleries - Yoichi and Miyagikyo.

Tasting Notes (2)

Created in 1796 by Basil Hayden, who went against the grain (no pun intended) by adding in rye into the traditional corn-based mashbill. It was a huge hit and today is one of Jim Beam's 'Small Batch' range of bourbons.

Tasting Notes (1)

Relaunched in the UK in 2015, Baker's is a powerful small-batch bourbon which utilises a special kind of yeast for extra smoothness. Rich and intense, this is a perfect substitute for an after-dinner Cognac.
A miniature of Jack Daniel's Tennessee Fire. Combining the legendary No.7 with a fiery cinnamon liqueur, this is sweet and spicy with notes of vanilla. Best enjoyed on its own, slightly chilled.

An outstanding single barrel bourbon from Four Roses. Beautifully balanced and smooth as silk, this is sweet, rich and potent with very appealing menthol notes, precious woods and delicious spices.

Tasting Notes (2)

Created to represent whiskey before it was mass produced, Knob Creek embodies the look, feel and taste of pre-prohibition bourbon. This is a long-aged, high-rye bourbon from Jim Beam.

Tasting Notes (1)

Formerly known as Ridgemont Reserve, 1792 is a bourbon distilled in Bardstown and named for the year that Kentucky became a state. A bit of a hidden gem, with a very low profile despite a huge 94.5 points in Jim Murray's Whisky Bible 2013.
Blanton's Gold Edition is selected from the best casks at the distillery. Rich, full of flavour and one of the best bourbons around.

product_name:
Blanton's Straight From the Barrel
(64.8%) Sample
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample of this single-barrel bottling from Blanton's in Kentucky. Bottled at a natural barrel-proof of 64.8%, this epic bourbon is not for the faint-hearted – a truly awesome sipping whiskey of unforgettable quality.

Named after the founding father of the bourbon industry, Colonel Edmund Haynes Taylor. This small batch bourbon is aged inside warehouses which he built and the brand is owned by Buffalo Trace.

Tasting Notes (1)
Blanton's Original was the first single-barrel bourbon when created in 1984. A classic and very popular American whiskey.

product_name:
Caol Ila 17 Year Old
Unpeated Special Releases 2015
product_description:
Always a staple in Diageo's Special Releases, the unpeated bottling of Caol Ila has reached 17 years of age. Wispy smoke combines with gingerbread, sweet-cured meat and smoked fish, with a refreshing lemony note.

Tasting Notes (1)

A miniature of Tomatin released to celebrate the effect that the distillery has had on the local community of the eponymous town, hence the name - Legacy. In 1897 it was an isolated and quiet place and the village grew to become a town due to the influx of workers and building done to support the distillery. A tasty dram that shows off the distillery's character.

Glenturret has long been known as the spiritual home of The Famous Grouse. 2015 saw a new range introduced, including this Triple Wood. This higher-strength UK release has been aged in a combination of three cask types: American oak sherry, European oak sherry and American oak bourbon; this is aromatic with notes of marzipan and coconut.
Unusually, as well as the required minimum 51% corn, the rest of the mash contains gluten-free millet instead of the more-usual rye or wheat. A sweet and spicy release from Chicago's Koval.

product_name:
Ballechin 10 Year Old
Heavily Peated Miniature
product_description: A miniature of Ballechin 10 Year Old. First released in summer 2014, this is the first ongoing release for Edradour's peated malt, after eight releases in The Discovery series.

Wolfburn has finally come of age. Northland is the first, and ongoing, release from the Scottish mainland's northernmost distillery. This is a light, sweet and fragrant whisky, with notes of fruit, nuts and a hint of peat.

Tasting Notes (1)

The opening entry in the super-premium Mortlach range, combining bourbon- and sherry-matured whisky to create a spicy, rich and flavoursome dram that shows off the distillery's excellent spirit.

Tasting Notes (1)

Part of Highland Park's Warrior series for travel retail, Ragnvald is primarily aged in European oak, with a small amount of American oak in the mix. The result is a rich whisky with dark chocolate notes.

Tasting Notes (1)

product_name: Wild Turkey Forgiven Bourbon and Rye
product_description: Wild Turkey Forgiven is a blend of 78% six-year-old bourbon and 22% four-year-old rye whiskies. Apparently initially produced due to a mix-up at the distillery, the result was so good they decided to release it.

product_name:
Tomatin 14 Year Old
Tawny Port Finish
product_description: Tomatin's 14 Year Old has been finished in tawny-port pipes, which adds notes of extra fruitiness, especially red fruits to the classic Highland notes of toffee and honey.

product_name:
Balblair 21 Year Old
The MacPhail's Collection
product_description: This is a 21-year-old vintage Balblair released by independent bottler Gordon & MacPhail as part of the MacPhail's Collection. Previous releases from this distillery by the specialists in long-matured whisky have been excellent.

Scallywag is a new addition to the Douglas Laing range. A blend of Speyside malts, including Mortlach, Macallan and Glenrothes aged in a combination of sherry and bourbon casks, this is a rich and complex vatting.

Tasting Notes (1)

Wolfburn Aurora is matured in three different types of cask: refill quarter casks, first-fill bourbon barrels and first-fill oloroso sherry hogsheads. The three components are married to produce a sweet whisky with hints of spice.

The second edition of Evolution, the follow up to Revival. A limited release showcasing their spirit's interaction with ex-Tennessee whiskey casks, this was matured in barrels that used to contain George Dickel.

First released in 2013, the Dalmore 25 is matured initially in American white oak before a second maturation in a combination of Palomino Fino sherry butts and first fill bourbon casks. These are then married together in bourbon barrels before a finishing period in Tawny Port pipes.

Tasting Notes (1)

Introducing the first and only official bottling from the North of Scotland Distillery Co, Alloa: a single-grain Scotch whisky aged in bourbon casks for more than 50 years. North of Scotland Distillery started producing whisky in 1957 and closed in 1980. This is a rare chance to taste long-aged whisky from this lost distillery and experience a slice of history.

Tasting Notes (1)
A bottle of Bushmills' entry into the world of honeyed whisky-based liqueurs - it's a sweet blend and harmony of Bushmills' whiskey, honey and spices with lots of fruitiness.
A Sauternes entry into Tullibardine's range of finished whiskies, filling the spirit into a 225 litre sweet wine cask for a short secondary maturation before bottling.

product_name:
Tomatin 12 Year Old Miniature
Bourbon & Sherry Casks
product_description: A miniature of the 2016 replacement for the previous sherry-finished expression, this Tomatin 12 Year Old has been aged in a combination of bourbon and sherry casks. The result is a sweet whisky with notes of apples, citrus and sweet spice.

product_name: Bowmore Vault Edition First Release 'Atlantic Sea Salt'
product_description: The Vault Editions from Bowmore is a four-part series of whiskies that highlight one characteristic of the distillery's style. The first release is named Atlantic Sea Salt and focuses on Bowmore's maritime style, while displaying its classic smoky and fruity nature.
A miniature of Glen Scotia 15 Year Old – matured in bourbon barrels. This has notes of ginger, vanilla, sea spray and spice.

A small bottle of Glenfarclas's rightly celebrated 105 – *the* cask strength, heavily-sherried Speyside whisky. Just the thing for sherry heads, whether you're experienced or just getting to grips with the wonderful world of sherried whisky.

An older 18 year old version of The Singleton of Dufftown, the European entry in the Singleton range. This builds on the massive success of the 12 and 15 year old, bringing more complexity to the spirit.

product_name:
Glen Moray 10 Year Old
Chardonnay Cask
product_description:
An interesting spicy dram from Glen Moray - a 10 year old whisky entirely matured in Chardonnay casks. The start of what we hope is a continuing line of new whiskies from this often overlooked distillery.

Tasting Notes (2)

Bacalta is the eight release in Glenmorangie's annual Private Edition series. Finished in casks which were seasoned with Malmsey Madeira, this is rich and fruity with notes of caramelised apricots, dates, almonds and honeycomb.

Tasting Notes (3)

An update to the much vaunted Bunnhabhain 25 year old, keeping the same age statement and presentation but upping the ABV to 46.3% to bring it line with the rest of the range. A great whisky at 43% but even better now with a little more oomph.
A small bottle of the standard expression from Glenkinchie, Diageo's remaining Lowland distillery.
Distillery Edition is the first ongoing release from Glenallachie since the 12 Year Old in the 1980s. This has notes of vanilla, citrus and hints of toast.
A small, but perfectly-formed miniature of the Bruadar liqueur, made with malt whisky, honey and sloe berries. Formerly known as Scottish Highland, this is very moreish.

product_name:
Buffalo Trace White Dog Mash 1
Half Bottle
product_description: The fad for distilleries releasing their new make spirit continues, this time in the form of Buffalo Trace's 'White Dog', the affectionate name given to unaged whiskey. Competitively-priced and attractively packaged, we reckon that Buffalo Trace's extra style credentials could well see this becoming a hit cocktail ingredient.

A 13yo single cask Glendullan bottled at full strength for the Managers' Choice series. Glendullan is another distillery we didn't see much of on this side of the pond, but malt from what is one of Diageo's larger distilleries has recently emerged in the US under the Singleton banner. Interestingly, this is marked as having come from a rejuvenated cask - kudos to Diageo for this extra snippet of clarity.

The limited-edition return of Glenmorangie Astar, bottled in 2017. Like the 2008 original, this has been aged in oak casks from Missouri, and has notes of almond, coconut and lots of spice.

Tasting Notes (1)

The Macallan Estate Reserve draws on casks selected for maximum intensity and depth of flavours, including some sherry-seasoned hogsheads, and has been bottled at the traditional strength of 80 UK prooof (45.7%). The 1824 Collection is a range of Macallans released for the travel retail market.

A peaty offering from an Islay distillery best known for its aromatic, approachable single malts. Aged in first-full bourbon since 2004, this dram adds an extra layer of intensity to the distillery's normal notes of vanilla, sweet fruits and light smoke.

Tasting Notes (1)

Another innovative release from John Glaser and the Compass Box team. A vatting of northern Highland distilleries (principally Clynelish), the whisky is aged in unique barrels with heavily toasted heads, adding a rich spiciness – great sipped neat or used as the base for a whisky cocktail.
Laphroaig 18yo was introduced in 2009 as a replacement for the old 15 Year Old (Prince Charles' sorely missed favourite whisky, lest we forget). This is a stronger, altogether gutsier affair at 48%.

Aroma is an integral part of the whisky tasting experience, which is why Macallan Edition No. 3 so exciting: it has been created in conjunction with Roja Dove, one of the most respected 'noses' in the perfume industry.


A blend of six cask types, this whisky has the complex aromas of a fine fragrance, with notes of flowers, vanilla ice cream and orange oil leading into chocolate and burnished oak. The vanilla continues on the tongue, intermingled with sweet fruit, rich fruit cake and light resin.

Tasting Notes (1)
The new presentation of an old Bowmore favourite, the no-age-statement Legend.

A quarter-bottle each of the Bowmore 12yo, 15yo Darkest and 18yo. Not just a great starter set, but also the perfect gift for anyone looking to explore the charms of Islay's oldest surviving distillery.
Coole Swan is a tasty cream liqueur made with single malt Irish whiskey, Belgian white chocolate and fresh cream. This is always a smash hit at our in-store customer tastings.
A cracking cream liqueur made with a healthy whack of Wales' finest - Penderyn single malt spirit. This is extremely tasty.

Arran Gold is a cream liqueur based on Arran's single malt whisky, and was named as the 'World's Best Whisky Liqueur' at Whisky Magazine's World Whisky Awards 2007 - what more recommendation do you need?

product_name: Port Askaig 8 Year Old Glass Set
product_description:
Know someone that loves Islay single malts? Delight them with this beautiful Port Askaig glass set, which features a bottle of warming, smoky eight-year-old whisky made at an unnamed distillery, plus two beautifully-shaped tasting glasses.

Tasting Notes (1)

When it comes to whisky ages, 21 has always been good for Benriach. This edition has been matured in four different types of cask: bourbon barrels, virgin oak casks, PX sherry casks and red wine casks. Master blender has carefully balanced the characters of these powerfully flavoured casks to create an richly flavoured whisky that adds layers of complexity to Benriach's fruity spirit.

Tasting Notes (1)

Airigh Nam Beist 1990 is a delicious vintage bottling from the ongoing success story that is Ardbeg. Sadly now discontinued due to exhausted stocks, 'the Beist' was an extremely popular Ardbeg, with assertive and powerful peatiness and a lovely honeyed edge. Oh, and it's pronounced 'Arry nam Baysht'.

Tasting Notes (4)

product_name: Glen Grant 18 Year Old + 2 Glasses Pack
product_description: Part of Glen Grant's range, the 18 Year Old is rich and complex with notes of caramel, raisins and vanilla. This is presented in a stylish box with a pair of glasses. Winner of Jim Murray's 'Whisky of the Year 2020'.
A miniature bottle of 10 year old Glengoyne, the distillery's entry level offering. Glengoyne is reported to be one of Scotland's least peated malts, due to the fact the barley is dried by air.

product_name:
Glenfiddich Mini Pack
12 Year Old, 15 Year Old & 18 Year Old Miniature
product_description: A gift pack of three miniature bottles of Glenfiddich - their best-selling 12 year old, 15 year old Solera matured and the elegant 18 year old.

A Perfect Measure sample of 15-year-old single malt from Bowmore, which spends its final three years in oloroso sherry casks. It is elegantly balanced between this sherry influence and the distillery's fruit and peat characteristics – including a siren-like whisper of tropical fruit that will delight fans of older-style Bowmore.

The name Spios, which is Scots Gaelic for 'spice', beautifully evokes this whisky's origins: it has been matured solely in casks that previously held American rye whiskey, a spirit known for its distinctive, spicy characteristics. Spios has a herbal nose and a rich, spicy palate, followed by a long, sweet finish.


Glenmorangie Spios is the ninth limited edition bottling in the distillery's Private Edition series, and the first single malt to have ever been entirely matured in American rye whiskey casks.

Tasting Notes (2)
None

A mystery Islay single malt bottled at a hefty 58% by Finlaggan's owners the Vintage Malt Whisky Co. We don't know what this is, but we have our suspicions and there's no mystery about what a bargain this is.

Another winner from Nikka's Taketsuru range. This was named for the founder of the company, Masataka Taketsuru and is a big, bold full-bodied vatted whisky of truly exceptional depth, grace and balance.

Tasting Notes (6)

A storming example of what Japanese whisky is truly capable of. A previous batch was awarded a massive 95 points by Jim Murray in his Whisky Bible.

Tasting Notes (2)

product_name:
Bowmore 10 Year Old
Dark & Intense Litre
product_description: A 10-year-old Bowmore for travel retail called 'Dark & Intense', fully matured in Spanish oak hogsheads to give intensely fruity, spicy notes. The nose is full of raisins, Seville oranges, spices and maple syrup, while the palate has notes of dark fruits, raisins and a hint of sea salt. This whisky comes in a litre bottle.
An increasingly hard-to-find old presentation of the splendid Glenmorangie 18yo.
Glengoyne 21yo is noticeably deeper than younger expressions, with delicious rich, fruity and oaky notes – the darker colour and long finish are testament to the extra years in the sherry wood.
A former Monnier Trading exclusive bottled by Jack Wiebers as part of the Kreuzritter – Crusader – series. It's a 1995 vintage Glen Elgin, bottled at 22 years old from a single bourbon cask.

product_name:
Caol Ila 15 Year Old Unpeated
Special Releases 2018
product_description:
A sherry-forward edition of the yearly Diageo Special Releases unpeated Caol Ila. While whisky from the distillery is usually very smoky, this yearly release looks at the distillery's other, less well-known side: unpeated spirit. The 2018 bottling was matured in refill and rejuvenated American-oak hogsheads and ex-bodega European oak butts, which give a balance of elegant vanilla and orchard fruit, and richer, sherry oak flavour.

Tasting Notes (1)

A great whisky for those looking to try Glenrothes for the first time. This sweet, zesty dram has a yellow label that denotes the colour of the grape at the point it is plucked from the vine.


This whisky is part of the Soleo collection, a series paying homage to the ageing process used on some sherry grapes. Each whisky in the series has a different colour label, each reflecting a different stage of the grapes' maturation.

Tasting Notes (1)

Inspired by Captain Bill Grant Smith, great grandson of Glenlivet's founder, Captain's Reserve is finished in casks that previously held Cognac – a process that creates distinctive notes of raisin and honey within this creamy, citrusy single malt.

Tasting Notes (1)

An 'explosive' limited-edition whisky from Smokehead, adding in a punch of sherry character to the anonymous peaty dram. It's matured in Oloroso sherry casks, fusing the big smoke with equally big sweetness and dried fruit notes.
A half bottle of Glenfiddich's flagship 12 year old whisky - as of 2011 the largest selling single malt whisky in the world.

product_name:
For The Love Of Islay Tasting Set
6x3cl
product_description: A Perfect Measure tasting set exploring Islay Whisky. This set includes a 3cl sample bottle of each of the following: Port Askaig 12 Year Old Spring Edition, Bunnahabhain 18 Year Old, Bowmore Vault First Release, Laphroaig 10 Year Old Cask Strength Batch 012, Port Charlotte 10 Year Old and Lagavulin 2002 Distillers Edition, bottled in 2018.

A 2011 vintage Bere barley single malt from Bruichladdich, distilled from six-row barley grown on Orkney in the summer of 2010. Aromas of honeysuckle, orange blossom, mint, chocolate, malted barley, apricot jam and oaky spice fill the nose, complemented by notes of garden herbs, banana chips, vanilla, marshmallow, apricots and buttery toast throughout the palate.
A 2009 Mortlach single malt from independent bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a pair of hogsheads for 11 years, before being bottled in June 2021 as part of its Un-Chillfiltered Collection.

This limited release Glen Spey single malt was initially matured in refill Bourbon barrels before finishing in Côte-Rôtie casks. The French red wine influence has brought a deep red colour to the whisky - along with aromas of summer berries, rose petals and some toasted oak on the finish.

A sample bottle of Old Pulteney 15 Year Old. Matured in ex-bourbon and Spanish oak casks, this Highland single malt has notes of raisins, apples and dark chocolate on the palate. The finish is full of sweet toffee and sultanas, with a maritime undercurrent.
A 2010 Glen Spey single malt from independent bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a pair of hogsheads for a decade, before being bottled in May 2021 as part of its Un-Chillfiltered Collection.

A 2008 Dailuaine single malt from independent bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a pair of ex-bourbon barrels for 13 years, before being bottled in June 2021 as part of its Un-Chillfiltered Collection.
A 1997 Inchgower single malt from independent bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a single ex-sherry butt for 23 years, before being bottled in August 2020 as part of its Cask Strength Collection.

A Perfect Measure sample bottle of Old Pulteney 18 Year Old. This whisky was aged in both ex-bourbon and Spanish oak casks. This is an intense, warming single malt, highlighting the classic coastal elements of Old Pulteney, with notes of honey and apples on the palate, and a rich, sweet finish of chocolate, honey and Christmas cake.

This sweet and smoky whisky was released as part of Jura's Aged Vintage series. It was matured for 21 years in ex-bourbon barrels, before being finished in virgin American white oak casks, creating a sweet and spicy character with creamy caramel, ginger biscuit and ripe berry aromas. The palate offers notes of sweet gingerbread, white chocolate, vanilla macaroons and custard, with a spicy fresh ginger edge.

product_name:
Cask Speyside 12 Year Old
Sherry Finish
product_description: A 12-year-old Cask Speyside single malt from A.D Rattray, finished in sherry casks. Aromas of marzipan, cinnamon, red apples and blackcurrants fill the nose, complemented by notes of cherries, plums, honey, marmalade and brambles throughout the palate.

product_name:
Glen Scotia 1992
28 Year Old Connoisseurs Choice
product_description: A 1992 Glen Scotia single malt from independent bottler Gordon & MacPhail, matured in a single first-fill barrel for almost three decades, before being bottled in January 2021 as part of its Connoisseurs Choice series. Aromas of rich butterscotch, red apples and toasted malt fill the nose, complemented by notes of white chocolate, orange, black pepper, rich oak and tart grapefruit throughout the palate.

product_name:
Deanston 18 Year Old Sample
Bourbon Matured
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample of 18-year-old Deanston single malt matured in first-fill bourbon casks. The distillery’s characteristically honeyed, fruity character is turned up to eleven and supplemented by the fresh tropical flavours, and rich, airy vanilla notes of American oak, all married and mellowed by a long, 18-year rest. Fantastic stuff.

product_name:
Balvenie A Day Of Dark Barley 26 Year Old
Story No.3
product_description:
The third whisky in the Balvenie Stories collection, A Day of Dark Barley is a 26-year-old single malt made using dark-roasted barley malt. A deep, oaky whisky, matured for over a quarter of a century in a first-fill bourbon cask, it has malty aromas of soft brown sugar, vanilla, blossom honey and gentle oak spice. The palate initially offers notes of sweet toffee and tangy orange, slowly developing vanilla, toasted oak and spicy ginger.


The Balvenie Stories collection is designed to bring to life the tales of 'character, endeavour and craft' of those at Balvenie through the generations.

product_name:
Arran 12 Year Old
The Man with the Golden Glass
product_description:
Bottled to celebrate the 12th anniversary of Arran's Distillery Manager James MacTaggart, The Man With The Golden Glass is a 12-year-old single malt, finished in Palo Cortado sherry casks. A fruity, spicy whisky, it has aromas of ripe peaches, sweet marmalade and spicy ginger. The palate offers notes of zesty citrus, dark chocolate, buttered toast and a hint of salt, before a long finish with notes of cider apple and fresh ginger.

Tasting Notes (1)

product_name: Glen Moray Rhum Agricole Finish Project
product_description: The second whisky in Glen Moray's experimental Elgin Curiosity series, this Speyside single malt has been finished in rhum Agricole casks from the St James distillery in Martinique. A sweet and spicy whisky, it has soft aromas of marzipan, apricot jam, pineapple and burnt sugar. The palate offers notes of treacle toffee, kirsch cherries and spicy gingerbread.

Made in 2005 at Aultmore Distillery, this Speyside single malt was matured in a single refill bourbon barrel and was bottled in April 2019 for Gordon & MacPhail's Connoisseur's Choice series. Sweet aromas of lemon curd and vanilla ice cream fill the nose, and the palate offers notes of white pepper, vanilla custard and candied citrus.

A Perfect Measure sample of the second release in Highland Park's Viking Legend series. Found upon the bodies of slain warriors and thought to invoke the presence of Odin himself, Valknut will transport you to a roaring longhouse feast with its woody, smoky and spicy character.

A limited-edition peated Highland single malt from Knockdhu, released to celebrate the distillery's 125th anniversary. anCnoc Peat has been matured in ex-bourbon casks, before being finished in Spanish oak butts, creating notes of almonds and dried fruit alongside waves of rich, earthy peat smoke.

product_name:
Glenrothes 11 Year Old
Sherry Cask Discovery Series
product_description: An 11-year-old Glenrothes single malt, matured in sherry casks and bottled by Gordon & MacPhail as part of its Discovery series. Aromas of forest fruits, cinnamon and dark chocolate roll off the nose is waves, and the palate offers notes of raspberries, blackberries, charred oak, cinnamon, and orange chocolates.

product_name:
Laphroaig 25 Year Old
Cask Strength Bot.2019
product_description: Bottled in 2019, this Laphroaig single malt has been matured in a combination of ex-bourbon barrels and oloroso sherry casks for a quarter of a century, before being bottled at cask strength. Waves of rich peat smoke mingle with warm spices, dried fruits and oak spice throughout the palate.

product_name:
Auchentoshan 1997
21 Year Old Sherry Cask Daily Dram
product_description: A 21-year-old Auchentoshan single malt, matured for 21 years before being bottled in 2019 by indie bottler Daily Dram, as part of its The Nectar of The Daily Drams series.

product_name:
Teaninich 11 Year Old Sample
Reserve Cask Parcel 5
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of a Teaninich single malt from independent bottler Elixir Distillers, matured in a batch of five ex-bourbon casks that were filled between 2007 and 2009, before being bottled in 2021 as part of its Single Malts of Scotland Reserve Casks series. Aromas of golden-syrup-sponge, matcha lattes and kiwi fill the nose, complemented by notes of mint chocolate, Madeira cake, tinned peaches, rosemary and basil throughout the palate.

product_name:
Teaninich 2013 Red Wine Cask Sample
Carn Mor
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of a 2013 Teaninich single malt from independent bottler Carn Mor, matured in a red wine cask for eight years and bottled in 2021 as part of its Strictly Limited series.

product_name:
Royal Brackla 21 Year Old Sample
Sherry Finish
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of 21-year-old single malt from Royal Brackla that has been finished in ex-sherry casks to add layers of dried fruit and sweet spices to the palate.

product_name:
Glenrothes 2011 Oloroso Sherry Finish Sample
Carn Mor
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of 2011 Glenrothes single malt from indie bottler Carn Mor. This was finished in oloroso sherry seasoned oak before being bottled in 2021 as part of its Strictly Limited series.

product_name:
Glenlivet 2006 Sample
14 Year Old Sherry Cask Signatory
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of 2006 Glenlivet single malt from independent bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a single first-fill sherry butt for 14 years, before being bottled in February 2021 as part of its Cask Strength Collection.

product_name: Glenallachie 13 Year Old Rioja Finish Sample
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of a limited-edition Glenallachie single malt finished in a specially-selected Rioja wine barrique, creating aromas of ripe bananas, raisins, pineapple and mocha that fill the nose, complemented by notes of almonds, cinnamon and dried fruit.

product_name: Glenallachie 12 Year Old Sauternes Finish Sample
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of a limited-edition 12-year-old Glenallachie single malt that was finished in a specially-selected Sauternes wine cask.

product_name:
Bunnahabhain 2004
16 Year Old Carn Mor Celebration of Cask
product_description: A 2004 Bunnahabhain single malt from indie bottler Carn Mor, matured in a single sherry butt for 16 years, before being bottled in March 2021 as part of its Celebration of the Cask series. The palate offers notes of dried fruit, tobacco, smoked ham and roasted pineapple that linger in the finish.
A 2008 Benrinnes single malt from indie bottler Carn Mor, bottled as part of its Strictly Limited series.

product_name:
Blair Athol 2010
10 Year Old First Editions
product_description: A 2010 Blair Athol single malt from indie bottler Hunter Laing, matured in a single sherry butt for a decade, before being bottled in 2021 as part of its First Editions range. Aromas of strawberry, honeycomb, shortbread and foam banana sweets fill the nose, complemented by notes of buttery pastry, oak spice, red fruit and vanilla throughout the palate.

Jim Beam's take on the popular honey and whiskey liqueur. Made with Jim Beam's bourbon and real golden honey. Notes of vanilla, caramel, and oak with a superb honey finish. We recommend having this slightly chilled or over ice.

A peated single malt from Character of Islay Whisky Company, distilled at a mystery distillery on Islay and matured for a decade in a combination of bourbon and sherry casks. The palate offers notes of poached peaches, hibiscus, earthy smoke and bonfires on the beach.

A 1991 Glencadam single malt from independent bottler Gordon & MacPhail, matured in a single refill bourbon cask for 29 years, before being bottled in January 2021 as part of its Connoisseurs Choice series. Aromas of crunchy apples, coconut and crystalised violets fill the nose, complemented by notes of tropical fruit, black pepper, orange zest and fiery ginger spice throughout the palate.

product_name:
Balvenie The Edge of Burnhead Wood
19 Year Old Stories
product_description: A 19-year-old single malt made with and of materials from the Balvenie grounds themselves, The Edge Of Burnhead Wood is the sixth instalment in the Balvenie Stories series. It is a robust single malt with delicate fig, orange and honey notes, accompanied a light spice and a backbone of toasted oak.

product_name:
Port Askaig 12 Year Old
Autumn Edition
product_description: The limited-edition Autumn Edition Port Askaig 12 Year Old single malt is a combination of nine refill American oak hogsheads, five oloroso sherry butts and three solera sherry butts, bottled in 2020. Aromas of cranberries, smoky bacon, black cherries and Christmas pudding fill the nose. The palate offers notes of red grapes, smouldering driftwood, dry seaweed, cherry tomatoes and hawthorn berries.
A 2008 Ballechin single malt from Edradour's Straight From The Cask series, matured in a single ex-bourbon cask for a decade, before being bottled in December 2018.

product_name:
Caol Ila 2010
9 Year Old Sherry Cask Signatory
product_description: A 2010 Caol Ila single malt from indie bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a single refill sherry butt for nine years, before being bottled in June 2020 as part of its Cask Strength Collection.
A set for four miniature bottles of Tullibardine whisky, including Tullibardine Sovereign, Tullibardine 225, Tullibardine 228 and Tullibardine 500.

product_name:
Ballechin 2010
10 Year Old Oloroso Sherry Cask
product_description: A 2010 Ballechin single malt, matured in a single oloroso sherry cask for a decade before being bottled in April 2021 as part of its Straight From The Cask series.

product_name:
Laphroaig 1999
21 Year Old Xtra Old Particular
product_description: A 1999 Laphroaig single malt from indie bottler Douglas Laing, matured in a single refill sherry butt for 21 years, before being bottled in February 2021 as part of its Xtra Old Particular series.

A new presentation of Inchmoan 12 Year Old, released in 2020. Inchmoan is the peated single malt produced at Loch Lomond. The 12 Year Old is sweet and spicy with notes of vanilla and a smoky backbone.

A 1995 Deanston single malt, matured in oloroso sherry casks for more than two decades, creating a sweet, honeyed character that offers aromas of honey, sweet oak, toffee, raisins and dark chocolate on the nose, that are echoed throughout the palate.

product_name:
Benriach The Smoky Twelve
12 Year Old
product_description: A whisky that focuses on the richer side of Benriach's spirit, as well as it's darker smokier side. Aged for 12 years in a combination of bourbon, sherry and marsala casks, the peat smoke is complimented by dried fruit and vanilla from the bourbon and sherry casks, and rich, sweet fruit from the marsala.

product_name:
Glengoyne Triple Gift Pack
12, 15, 18 Year Old 3x20cl
product_description: A trio of small bottles of single malt whisky from Glengoyne, including its 12-year-old, 15-year-old and 18-year-old single malts. This makes the perfect gift for the Glengoyne fan in your life.

product_name:
Glen Garioch 2011
9 Year Old Sherry Cask Carn Mor Strictly Limited
product_description: A 2011 Glen Garioch single malt from indie bottler Carn Mor, matured in an ex-sherry butt for nine years before being bottled in 2021 as part of its Strictly Limited series.

product_name:
Glenrothes 2011
9 Year Old Sherry Finish Carn Mor Strictly Limited
product_description: A 2011 Glenrothes single malt from indie bottler Carn Mor that was finished in oloroso sherry seasoned oak before being bottled in 2021 as part of its Strictly Limited series.

product_name:
Glenburgie 2012
8 Year Old Carn Mor Strictly Limited
product_description: A 2012 Glenburgie single malt from independent bottler Carn Mor, matured in a bourbon barrel for eight years before being bottled in 2021 as part of its Strictly Limited series.

product_name:
Royal Brackla 21 Year Old
Sherry Finish
product_description: A 21-year-old single malt from Royal Brackla that has been finished in ex-sherry casks to add layers of dried fruit and sweet spices to the palate.

product_name:
Dufftown 2008
12 Year Old Sherry Finish Berry Bros & Rudd
product_description: A 2008, 12-year-old, Dufftown single malt from independent bottler Berry Bros & Rudd, bottled from a single Pedro Ximenez sherry cask in 2021.

product_name:
Benriach The Smoky Ten
10 Year Old
product_description: A fruity whisky that shows-off the darker, lesser-known side of Benriach's whisky: peaty and smoky spirit. This ten-year old brings together bourbon and virgin-oak casks with Jamaican-rum casks, for a fruity, smoky and spicy dram.
A 16-year-old Strathisla single malt, matured in a second-fill butt for more than a decade and matured in May 2019.

product_name: Two Stacks Smoke & Mirrors Cask Strength
product_description: A cask-strength peated Irish whiskey from Two Stacks that has been matured in a combination of ex-bourbon and ex-imperial stout casks, creating a complex, well-balanced character. Aromas of honeydew melons, sweet barley, rhubarb, peach, toffee and soft peat smoke fill the nose, complemented by notes of honey, dry peat, white peaches, dark chocolate and creamy vanilla throughout the palate.
A 20-year-old Longmorn single malt, matured in a second-fill butt for two decades and bottled in June 2019.

product_name:
Blair Athol 1995
25 Year Old Sherry Cask Old Malt Cask
product_description: A 1995 Blair Athol single malt from indie bottler Hunter Laing, matured in a single sherry butt for a quarter of a century before being bottled in February 2021 as part of its Old Malt Cask series. Aromas of stewed fruit, garden herbs, black tea and caramel fill the nose, complemented by notes of nutmeg, ginger and coconut throughout the palate.

product_name:
Glentauchers 2007
12 Year Old Sherry Cask Distillery Edition
product_description: A 12-year-old Glentauchers single malt from The Distillery Reserve Collection, matured in a single first-fill sherry butt for more than a decade and bottled in June 2019.

A 2007 Distillers Edition Cragganmore single malt that has been finished in ex-Port casks before being bottled in 2019. This jammy, rich whisky offers notes of honey-covered raspberries, tobacco, wild berry compote and cacao throughout the palate.

product_name:
Glenburgie 1989 Sample
29 Year Old Berry Brothers and Rudd
product_description: This 29 Year Old Glenburgie single malt was distilled in 1989, before being aged in a single refill sherry butt and bottled by Berry Bros & Rudd in 2018. Try it now with this Perfect Measure sample bottle.

Matured exclusively in ex-bourbon casks, Tobermory 12 Year Old has a vibrant, fruity and spicy character with a subtle, salty edge. This Hebridean single malt has sweet, honeyed aromas of vanilla, ripe oranges and delicate flowers. The palate offers notes of fresh citrus, apples and tropical fruits, followed by creamy toffee, floral honey and a subtly, salty undercurrent. Try it now with this Perfect Measure sample bottle.

This 12-year-old whisky is part of The Soleo Collection: a range of five whiskies from The Glenrothes, ranging from 10 to 25 years old, which pay homage to the grapes from which some sherries, such as Pedro Ximénez, are made. Try it now with this Perfect Measure sample bottle.

product_name:
Croftengea 2007
13 Year Old North Star Series 014
product_description: A 2007 Croftengea single malt from indie bottler North Star Spirits that was matured in a refill hogshead for 13 years before being bottled.

product_name:
Lochindaal 2010
10 Year Old North Star Series 014
product_description: A 2010 Bruichladdich Lochindaal single malt from indie bottler North Star Spirits that was matured in a single barrel for a decade, before being bottled as part of its Series 014.

A 2001 Knockando single malt, matured for 18 years creating aromas of warm porridge, honey, raisins, blackcurrants and roasted nuts on the nose. The palate offers notes of fresh barley, strawberry compote, roasted almonds, burnt orange peel, dark chocolate and old leather that linger in the finish.

product_name:
Linkwood 15 Year Old
G&M Distillery Labels
product_description: A 15-year-old Linkwood single malt from indie bottler Gordon & MacPhail, bottled as part of its Distillery Labels series. Aromas of chocolate-covered raisins, green grass and almonds fill the nose, complemented by notes of cinnamon and nutmeg, blueberry muffins and milky tea throughout the palate.
The 2003 Lagavulin Distillers Edition was bottled in 2019 after a decade and a half, and has been finished in Pedro Ximenez sherry casks. Try it now with this Perfect Measure sample bottle.

product_name:
Ledaig 2008
12 Year Old Hermitage Cask Finish Connoisseurs Choice
product_description: A 2008 Ledaig single malt from indie bottler Gordon & MacPhail that has been initially matured in refill sherry hogsheads and finished for three years in Hermitage casks before being bottled in October 2020. Aromas of summer berries and lemon zest fill the nose, wrapped in tendrils of sweet smoke. The palate offers notes of black pepper, raspberries, apple and soft smoke that linger in the finish.

product_name:
Bunnahabhain 1989 Sample
28 Year Old Berry Bros & Rudd
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of 28-year-old single cask single malt from veteran whisky merchant Berry Brothers and Rudd. This was distilled in 1989 and bottled in 2018, and the years in oak have allowed stone fruit and honey notes to develop.

product_name:
Loch Lomond 20 Year Old
Royal St George's Open Course Collection
product_description: A 20-year-old Loch Lomond single malt made in collaboration with professional golfer Darren Clarke and Loch Lomond master blender Michael Henry. Matured in specially-commissioned virgin English oak casks, the palate offers notes of caramel, green apple, honeydew melon, toasted oak and clove, with hints of lime and ginger lingering in the finish.

A limited-edition single malt from Loch Lomond, created in collaboration with Scottish professional golfer Colin Montgomerie. Matured in three different types of American oak casks and finished in virgin American oak, this whisky offers notes of sweet vanilla, ripe fruit and soft spices throughout the palate.
A 2005 vintage Tomintoul single malt, matured in a single ex-sherry butt for 14 years, before being bottled in January 2020.

product_name:
Glenrothes 2005
15 Year Old Old Particular Purim Edition 2021
product_description: A 2005 Glenrothes single malt from indie bottler Douglas Laing, matured in a single sherry butt for 15 years, before being bottled in February 2021 as part of its Old Particular Purim Edition.

product_name:
Scallywag 10 Year Old
Sherry Cask Douglas Laing
product_description: A small-batch release of Douglas Laing's Scallywag 10 Year Old blended malt, matured in sherry casks for a decade, creating layers of fruit and spice throughout the palate.

product_name:
Loch Lomond 18 Year Old
Small Bottle
product_description: Loch Lomond 18 Year Old is matured in American-oak casks, it is full-bodied and rounded with notes of toast, cigar box, apple, gooseberry and light smoke.

A very special edition of Douglas Laing's Big Peat blended malt that honours the heroes of the COVID-19 pandemic. As bold and smoky as ever, Big Peat Heroes is smoky and ashy, with notes of salty sea breezes, lemons and savoury peat smoke that linger in the finish.

A Perfect Measure sample bottle of the fifth release in Elixir Distillers' Rosebank Roses series. Fascination is a 21-year-old single malt which, like the others in the collection, has been released to celebrate Valentine’s Day. This single malt is a combination of spirit distilled in both 1990 and 1991, matured in ex-Madeira casks and American oak barrels for 21 years. Citrussy aromas of candied citrus peel and fresh lemon are joined by rye bread, white chocolate, sherbet pips and mint on the nose, complemented by notes of green apple, sugared almonds, custard and vanilla cream throughout the palate.

product_name:
Glen Scotia Double Cask
Small Bottle
product_description: Glen Scotia Double Cask starts its life in first-fill bourbon barrels, before being finished in Pedro-Ximenez-sherry casks. Notes of spicy fruit and vanilla.

product_name:
Mannochmore 2009
11 Year Old Reserve Cask Parcel #5
product_description: A 2009 Mannochmore single malt from indie bottler Elixir Distillers, matured in a batch of seven hogsheads for 11 years before being bottled in 2021 as part of its Single Malts of Scotland Reserve Cask series. Aromas of lime, dill pickle, hay bales, apple sauce, bread-and-butter pudding and raspberry jelly fill the nose, complemented by notes of buttery toast, pear drops, toasted cardamom pods, custard and elderflower throughout the palate.

product_name:
Glen Scotia Double Cask
Small Bottle Glass Set
product_description: A lovely gift set from Glen Scotia that includes a bottle of Glen Scotia Double Cask – a Campbeltown single malt that starts its life in first-fill bourbon barrels, before being finished in Pedro-Ximenez-sherry casks.

product_name:
Speyburn 2009
11 Year Old Sherry Cask Connoisseurs Choice
product_description: A 2009 Speyburn single malt from independent bottler Gordon & MacPhail, matured in a first-fill sherry butt for 11 years, before being bottled in April 2021 as part of its Connoisseurs Choice series. Aromas of toffee apples, brown sugar and stewed raisins fill the nose, complemented by notes of summer berries, pomegranate, white pepper and autumnal spices throughout the palate.

A 1998 Mortlach single malt from independent bottler Gordon & MacPhail, matured in a single first-fill bourbon barrel for 22 years, before being bottled in February 2021 as part of its Connoisseurs Choice series. Aromas of citrus peel, toasted almond and aniseed fill the nose, complemented by notes of honeycomb, red apple, black pepper and lemon zest throughout the palate.

product_name:
Caol Ila 2008
12 Year Old The Cooper's Choice
product_description: A 2008 Caol Ila single malt from The Vintage Malt Whisky Co.'s Cooper's Choice series, matured in a single bourbon cask for 12 years, before being bottled in 2021.

product_name:
Orkney 2009
11 Year Old Berry Bros Small Batch
product_description: A 2009 Orkney single malt from Berry Bros & Rudd, made at a mystery distillery and matured in refill hogsheads for 11 years, before being bottled in 2020 as part of its Winter Releases. Aromas of heather honey, peat smoke and blackberries fill the nose and are echoed throughout the palate.

product_name:
Blair Athol 2008 Sample
12 Year Old Signatory
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of 2008 Blair Athol single malt from independent bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a single sherry hogshead for 12 years, before being bottled in April 2021 as part of its Cask Strength Collection.

product_name: Glenallachie 11 Year Old Grattamacco Finish Sample
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of a limited-edition 11-year-old Glenallachie single malt, finished in a specially-selected Grattamacco wine cask. This creates aromas of heather honey, toffee, dark chocolate, peaches, almond, orange and nutmeg that fill the nose and are echoed throughout the palate, alongside notes of red berries and spicy ginger.

A cask strength Islay single malt from Morrison Scotch Whisky Distillers Mac-Talla range, Mara reflects the maritime character of this Hebridean island, surrounded by the Atlantic sea. The palate offers notes of smoked meat, charred oak, salty driftwood and smouldering peat, with hints of dried seaweed, beach bonfires and rock salt that linger in the finish.

product_name:
Tomatin 2008 Monbazillac Cask Sample
French Collection
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of a limited-edition 2008 Tomatin single malt from the distillery's French Collection that has been finished in Monbazillac wine casks. The result is aromas of maple syrup, freshly-brewed espresso and cinnamon-baked apples that fill the nose, complemented by notes of milk chocolate, honeycomb, walnuts and maple syrup throughout the palate.

Enjoy the full lineup of the 2021 Whisky, Rum, Gin and Champagne of the Year winners with this fantastic bundle. Explore the world of peaty whiskies with Port Charlotte 10 Year Old, be transported to the tropics with Mount Gay XO rum, celebrate good times with Charles Heidieck Brut Reserve Champagne and add a citrussy twist to your favourite cocktails with Lind & Lime gin.

This product is a bundle offer. It will be displayed in the checkout with the special discounted price, and the components shown below without price. Please be aware that there are no extra free items with these bundles.
A 1992 Isle of Jura single malt from indie bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a single ex-bourbon barrel for 28 years, before being bottled in June 2020 as part of its Cask Strength Collection.

product_name:
Tomatin 2008 Sauternes Cask Sample
French Collection
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of a limited-edition 2008 Tomatin single malt from the distillery's French Collection that has been finished in Sauternes wine casks. Aromas of peach, apricot and rich Manuka honey fill the nose, complemented by notes of coconut, ginger and peaches in syrup throughout the palate.

product_name:
Glen Moray Heritage Range Miniature Gift Set
4x5cl
product_description: A lovely gift pack from Glen Moray that explores the Elgin Heritage Range. This gift set includes a miniature bottle of Glen Moray Classic single malt, Glen Moray 10 Year Old, Glen Moray 12 Year Old and Glen Moray 15 Year Old.

product_name:
Tomatin 2008 Rivesaltes Cask Sample
French Collection
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of a limited-edition 2008 Tomatin single malt from the distillery's French Collection that was finished in Rivesaltes wine casks. Aromas of toasted hazelnuts, sweet barley and soft fruits that fill the nose and are echoed throughout the palate.

A 2006 Macduff single malt from independent bottle Gordon & MacPhail, matured in a single refill barrel for 14 years, before being bottled in February 2021 as part of its Connoisseurs Choice series. Aromas of lemon peel, white chocolate, grapefruit and vanilla fill the nose, complemented by notes of rich honey, sweet oranges, cocoa powder, ginger and white pepper throughout the palate.
A 1995 Glenburgie single malt from independent bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a pair of hogsheads for 25 years, before being bottled in April 2021 as part of its Cask Strength Collection.

A 2000 Auchentoshan single malt from independent bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a single ex-bourbon barrel for 21 years, before being bottled in April 2021 as part of its Cask Strength Collection.

product_name:
Leapfrog (Laphroaig) 1987
12 Year Old Cask #4216 Murray McDavid

Singleton of Dufftown 12 Year Old
2 Glass Set
product_description: A gift set from Singleton that includes a bottle of Singleton of Dufftown 12 Year Old and a pair of stylish tumblers.

product_name:
Talisker 10 Year Old Campfire Hot Chocolate Gift Pack
Small Bottle
product_description: A tasty gift set from Talisker with everything you need to make a sweet and smoky hot chocolate, including a small bottle of Talisker 10 Year Old and a stylish Talisker mug.
A 2009 Mortlach single malt from independent bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a pair of hogsheads for 11 years, before being bottled in June 2021 as part of its Un-Chillfiltered Collection.

Try a Perfect Measure sample of this delicious twist on Arran's spicy, malty, creamy character. This entry in their Cask Finishes series saw the whisky finished in casks that had previously held sweet Sauternes wine – something that gave this island single malt lashings of extra honey, grape and floral notes.

product_name:
Glenlivet 2007 Sample
12 Year Old Signatory for TWE
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of a specially-selected Glenlivet 2007, bottled by Signatory Vintage exclusively for The Whisky Exchange as part of our 20th anniversary celebrations. It's the latest in a series of incredible sherry-cask Glenlivets that Signatory have bottled for us and it's maybe the best yet – big, rich and packed with dried fruit, dark fruit cake and spice. A true sherry bomb.

product_name:
Edradour 1995 Sample
21 Year Old Oloroso Finish
product_description: This limited-edition Edradour was aged in ex-bourbon barrels for almost 10 years, then spent a further 12 years in first fill oloroso sherry butts. The result is a single malt with notes of burnt almonds, apricots, raisins, coconut and a hint of chocolate. Try it now with this Perfect Measure sample bottle.

product_name: Glen Grant 15 Year Old Batch Strength First Edition
product_description: A sweet, spiced single malt from Glen Grant, the first edition of its 15 Year Old Batch Strength whisky offers floral aromas of orange, apple, honeydew melon, caramel, oak and heather that fill the nose. The palate holds notes of vanilla, honey, apricot marmalade, sweet malt and baking spices that linger in the finish alongside apple and cinnamon.

A Perfect Measure sample bottle of peaty whisky from Tobermory on the Isle of Mull, named after a previous incarnation of the distillery. Maritime and smoky, this rivals some of the Islay drams for power, and the 10 year old balances the intensity of youth with rounded, well-aged spirit.

product_name:
Dufftown 2009 Sample
9 Year Old Berry Bros & Rudd
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample bottle of a 2009 Dufftown single malt from indie bottler Berry Bros & Rudd, matured for nine years and bottled in 2019. Aromas of soft fruit, green grass, warm toast, honey and melon fill the nose, complemented on the palate by notes of toasted oak, liquorice, blackcurrant and lively citrus.
Formerly carrying a vintage, Knockando's ongoing bourbon-cask bottling has now been released as a 12 year old. Light and fruity with spicy hints. Try it now with this Perfect Measure sample bottle.

Batch 70 of Aberlour's A'Bunadh range has been matured in ex-oloroso sherry casks, creating spicy aromas oranges, sherry-soaked raisins and dark chocolate that fill the nose. The palate offers notes of black cherries, dried fruit, dark chocolate and crystalised ginger that lingers in the finish.
A 1996 Benrinnes single malt from indie bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a single hogshead for more than two decades before being bottled in March 2020.

product_name:
Port Askaig 12 Year Old Sample
Autumn Edition
product_description: A Perfect Measure sample of the limited-edition Autumn Edition Port Askaig 12 Year Old single malt, made from a combination of nine refill American oak hogsheads, five oloroso sherry butts and three solera sherry butts, and bottled in 2020. Aromas of cranberries, smoky bacon, black cherries and Christmas pudding fill the nose. The palate offers notes of red grapes, smouldering driftwood, dry seaweed, cherry tomatoes and hawthorn berries.

product_name:
Benriach The Twelve
12 Year Old Miniature
product_description: A miniature of a big Benriach, taking the distillery's fruity spirit and adding layers of rich and dark flavour to it. Aged for 12 years in bourbon, sherry and port casks, it's a spicy dram with loads of dried fruit and soft spice.
A 10-year-old Glentauchers single malt from The Distillery Reserve Collection, matured in a single first-fill barrel and bottled in June 2019.
A 15-year-old Longmorn single malt, matured in a first-fill barrel for more than a decade and bottled in June 2019.

A 1991 Deanston single malt, finished in a Muscat wine cask before being bottled in 2020. Aromas of cinnamon, clove-studded oranges, lemon curd and black pepper fill the nose, complemented by notes of marmalade, honey, sultanas, buttered toast and apricots on the palate.

product_name:
Deanston 2002
17 Year Old Pinot Noir Finish
product_description: A limited-edition 2002 Deanston single malt that has been finished in Pinot Noir casks, creating a fruity, honeyed character. Aromas of apples, pears, creamy vanilla, oaky spice and green grapes fill the nose. The palate offers notes of sweet malt, shortbread, cinnamon, sultanas, plum, honey and dried fruit that linger in the finish.

product_name:
Bunnahabhain Moine 1997
22 Year Old PX Sherry Cask
product_description: A smoky 1997 Bunnahabhain single malt, matured in a single Pedro Ximenez cask until it was bottled in January 2020. The result is aromas of toffee, dried fruits, roasted nuts and chocolate on the nose, complemented by notes of raisins, sultanas, honeyed dates, coffee and salted caramel chocolate.

A limited-edition 1989 Glendronach single malt, released in 2020 to celebrate The King's Man film. Made from a combination of six sherry casks, hand selected by master blender Rachel Barrie and the film's writer, producer and director Matthew Vaughn, each cask was filled in 1989 and matured for 29 years. Aromas of dark berries, tart plum skins, sherry-soaked walnuts, leather and rich oak spices fill the nose. The palate offers notes of autumn fruits, dates, figs, cocoa, raisins and treacle.

Laphroaig Four Oak is, perhaps unsurprisingly, a blend of whisky matured in four different types of cask: ex-bourbon barrels, small quarter casks, virgin American oak barrels and European oak hogsheads.

Tasting Notes (1)

product_name:
Mortlach 1999
21 Year Old Sherry Finish Special Releases 2020
product_description:
A rich and dark whisky that combines the classic sherry-matured style of Mortlach with a window into the fruity side of its spirit. It's the Mortlach entry in the Diageo Special Releases 2020, a 26-year-old whisky finished in sherry casks, giving it the rich, layers of dried fruit that you'd expect, without overpowering the distillery's character.

Tasting Notes (1)

product_name:
Glenlivet 15 Year Old
French Oak Reserve
product_description:
A cut above the standard-issue 12yo, Glenlivet 15yo is finished, as the name suggests, in Limousin French Oak (the same kind that is used for many Cognacs). Expect rich notes of fruit, almonds and sweet spice.

Tasting Notes (1)

Glen Moray Classic is the distillery's entry-level single malt, aged for an average of seven years in ex-bourbon casks, of which a high percentage are first fill - easy drinking, honeyed and excellent value.

Tasting Notes (1) 

Please note


Minor damages on presentation box.

A 22-year-old single malt from Fettercairn, matured in ex-bourbon casks, creating aromas of banana bread, oranges, plum, raisins, figs and ginger bread on the nose. The palate offers notes of spiced pears, caramelised orange, coffee, liquorice, cherry and plum that linger in the finish.

A miniature of Glenfarclas 12 Year Old that's a great way to start exploring one of Scotland's most famous distilleries. This is characterful, rich and fruity, with many of the sherry notes that have made so many people fall in love with Glenfarclas over the years.

A delicious Highland dram from Old Pulteney, this 17yo is comprised of 90% refill bourbon casks with the remainder being from oloroso casks. Lovely sweet aromas of butterscotch, honey and chocolate, with some faint salt and oak spice on the palate.

Tasting Notes (1)
A 1997 Glantauchers single malt from indie bottler Signatory Vintage, matured in a pair of bourbon barrels for 22 years, before being bottled in March 2020 as part of its Cask Strength Collection.
A very clean, grassy, medium-bodied Highlander with a predominantly malty character. A real charmer, this is a great introductory malt.

product_name:
Glenfiddich IPA Cask Sample
Experimental Series
product_description: One of the first pair of entries in the Glenfiddich Experimental Series – a whisky finished in casks seasoned with India Pale Ale. The Speyside Craft Brewery created a special beer which was aged in ex-Glenfiddich casks for a month before they were returned to the distillery and filled with whisky for a three-month finishing period. The result is a vibrant and fruity dram. Try it now with this Perfect Measure sample bottle.
A 21-year-old single malt from Loch Lomond distillery, released in 2020.
Benriach's 10-year-old peated malt is named Curiositas. A sweet yet smoky whisky with notes of pepper and nuts.

A popular expression in Bowmore's ongoing range, this replaced the 17 year old, which was phased out a few years ago. Fresh, with notes of salty kippers and coal smoke.

Tasting Notes (1)

Glenlivet is one of those distilleries whose malts just keep improving with age. This superb 21yo is an elegant, intricate, sophisticated malt, presented in a very smart wooden box - just don't drop it on your foot.

Tasting Notes (1)

A twelve year old whisky from Tomintoul, this has been finished in an Oloroso sherry cask and is soft, sweet and creamy. Great value, as always with this distillery.

Tasting Notes (2)

A smoky addition to Bruichladdich's Cask Exploration series, Port Charlotte OLC:01 has been matured in a combination of ex-bourbon, ex-Syrah and ex-Vin du Naturel casks before being transferred into a parcel of oloroso sherry hogsheads from Bodega Fernando de Castilla. Aromas of peat smoke, figs, toffee and peach mingle with honey, mulled wine, dark chocolate and sea shells on the nose. The palate offers notes of peat smoke, sherry-soaked raisins, figs, orange, black pepper and walnuts.

product_name:
Caol Ila 2012
7 Year Old Sherry Cask Asta Morris
product_description: A 2012 Caol Ila single malt from indie bottler Asta Morris, matured for seven years in a single sherry butt before being bottled in 2020.

A very special, premium tasting set of Port Askaig, specially selected for virtual tastings. It spans the range and includes a Perfect Measure tasting glass and 3cl samples of each of Port Askaig 8 Year Old, Port Askaig 12 Year Old Autumn Edition, Port Askaig 100° Proof, Port Askaig 28 Year Old and the ultra-rare Port Askaig 45 Year Old.


Please note


This pack will be accompanied by a live tasting with Port Askaig chief blender Oliver Chilton and The Whisky Exchange ambassador Billy Abbott. Join them at 5.30pm BST on Thursday June 11 2020. We will contact purchasers by email on the day of the tasting with details of how to join in using Zoom. The tasting will also be broadcast live and will be available to watch again once it has finished on The Whisky Exchange Facebook page.
A no-age-statement expression from Speyburn. Bradan Orach means Golden Salmon, according to our exhaustive research.

A heavily-peated single malt from Jura Distillery, matured in a combination of ex-bourbon and ex-sherry casks, Prophecy is a sweet and smoky whisky. Aromas of floral heather, brazil nuts and salty sea air fill the nose, and the palate offers notes of smoky bacon, maple syrup, liquorice and dried fruit.


This whisky is named for an island prophecy, predicting the downfall of the Campbell clan, who ruled over the island for many generations. This prophecy stated that the last of the Campbells would leave the island with one eye and all his worldly possessions in a single cart, pulled by a white horse.

product_name:
Longmorn 2002
17 Year Old Signatory for TWE
product_description:
A 2002-vintage Longmorn from Signatory, selected by and bottled exclusively for The Whisky Exchange. We love Longmorn, and this bourbon-barrel-matured single-cask bottling showcases the fruitiness that so often gets lost in drams from the distillery. It was distilled on 17 September 2002 and bottled on 5 May 2020.

Tasting Notes (1)
A gift pack of miniature bottles from Loch Lomond, including a 5cl bottle of Loch Lochmond Original, 12-year-old and 18-year-old single malts.
